Sec-Fetch-Mode: navigate
Sec-Fetch-Site: same-origin
Sec-Fetch-User: ?1


Mon Jan  1 00:40:35 2024

HTTP/1.1 200 OK

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
    <body>
        <div id="ticket-info"></div>
        <div>
            <button type="button" onclick="cancel()">Cancel</button>
            <button type="button" onclick="exchange()">Exchange</button>
            <button type="button" onclick="print()">Exchange</button>
            <button type="button" id="generate" >QRcode</button>
        </div>
        <div class="body_qr"></div>
    </body>
    <script>
        const url = window.location.pathname;
        const id = url.split("/")[2];
        const generate= document.getElementById("generate");
        const qrcodebox = document.querySelector('.body-qr');
        function renderTicket(ticket) {
            const ticketInfo = document.getElementById("ticket-info");
            for (let key in ticket) {
                const div = document.createElement("div");
                div.className = "ticket-info-column";
                div.innerHTML = ticket[key];
                ticketInfo.appendChild(div);
            }
        }

        fetch(`/ticket/${id}`, {
            method: "GET",
        })
        .then(response => {
            return(response.text());
        })
        .then(data => {
            const ticket = JSON.parse(data)[0];
            renderTicket(ticket);
        })

        function cancel() {
            fetch(`/own/${id}`, {
                method: "DELETE",
                headers: {
                    "Content-Type": "text/html"
                },
                body: `ticket_id=${id}`
            })
            .then(response => {
                return(response.status);
            })
            .then(status => {
                if (status == 200) {
                    window.location.replace("http://localhost:8001/inventory");
                }
                else {
                    alert("Error");
                }
            });
        }

        function exchange() {

        }

        function print() {

        }
        //tao ma qr

        
        function generateQRCode(){
            
            qrcodebox.innerHTML="";
            new QRCode(qrcodebox,{
                text:"haha",
                height:"30px",
                width:"30px",
                colorLight:"#fff",
                colorDark:"#000"
            });

        }
        generateQRCode();
    </script>
    <script src="script.js"></script>
    <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/qrcodejs/1.0.0/qrcode.min.js"></script>
</html>

        <div>

            <button type="button" onclick="exchange()">Exchange</button>
            <button type="button" onclick="print()">Exchange</button>
            <button type="button" id="generate" >QRcode</button>
        </div>
        <div class="body_qr"></div>
    </body>
    <script>
        const url = window.location.pathname;
        const id = url.split("/")[2];
        const generate= document.getElementById("generate");
        const qrcodebox = document.querySelector('.body-qr');
        function renderTicket(ticket) {
            const ticketInfo = document.getElementById("ticket-info");
            for (let key in ticket) {
                const div = document.createElement("div");
                div.className = "ticket-info-column";
                div.innerHTML = ticket[key];
                ticketInfo.appendChild(div);
            }
        }

        fetch(`/ticket/${id}`, {
            method: "GET",
        })
        .then(response => {
            return(response.text());
        })
        .then(data => {
            const ticket = JSON.parse(data)[0];
            renderTicket(ticket);
        })

        function cancel() {
            fetch(`/own/${id}`, {
                method: "DELETE",
                headers: {
                    "Content-Type": "text/html"
                },
                body: `ticket_id=${id}`
            })
            .then(response => {
                return(response.status);
            })
            .then(status => {
                if (status == 200) {
                    window.location.replace("http://localhost:8001/inventory");
                }
                else {
                    alert("Error");
                }
            });
        }

        function exchange() {

        }

        function print() {

        }
        //tao ma qr

        
        function generateQRCode(){
            
            qrcodebox.innerHTML="";
            new QRCode(qrcodebox,{
                text:"haha",
                height:"30px",
                width:"30px",
                colorLight:"#fff",
                colorDark:"#000"
            });

        }
        generateQRCode();
    </script>

Accept-Language: en-US,en;q=0.5
Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflate, br
Referer: http://localhost:8001/inventory

Mon Jan  1 00:41:00 2024

HTTP/1.1 200 OK

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
    <body>
        <div id="ticket-info"></div>
        <div>
            <button type="button" onclick="cancel()">Cancel</button>
            <button type="button" onclick="exchange()">Exchange</button>
            <button type="button" onclick="print()">Exchange</button>
            <button type="button" id="generate" >QRcode</button>
        </div>
        <div class="body_qr"></div>
    </body>
    <script>
        const url = window.location.pathname;
        const id = url.split("/")[2];
        const generate= document.getElementById("generate");
        const qrcodebox = document.querySelector('.body-qr');
        function renderTicket(ticket) {
            const ticketInfo = document.getElementById("ticket-info");
            for (let key in ticket) {
                const div = document.createElement("div");
                div.className = "ticket-info-column";
                div.innerHTML = ticket[key];
                ticketInfo.appendChild(div);
            }
        }

        fetch(`/ticket/${id}`, {
            method: "GET",
        })
        .then(response => {
            return(response.text());
        })
        .then(data => {
            const ticket = JSON.parse(data)[0];
            renderTicket(ticket);
        })

        function cancel() {
            fetch(`/own/${id}`, {
                method: "DELETE",
                headers: {
                    "Content-Type": "text/html"
                },
                body: `ticket_id=${id}`
            })
            .then(response => {
                return(response.status);
            })
            .then(status => {
                if (status == 200) {
                    window.location.replace("http://localhost:8001/inventory");
                }
                else {
                    alert("Error");
                }
            });
        }

        function exchange() {

        }

        function print() {

        }
        //tao ma qr

        
        function generateQRCode(){
            
            qrcodebox.innerHTML="1";
            new QRCode(qrcodebox,{
                text:"haha",
                height:"30px",
                width:"30px",
                colorLight:"#fff",
                colorDark:"#000"
            });

        }
        generateQRCode();
    </script>
    <script src="script.js"></script>
    <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/qrcodejs/1.0.0/qrcode.min.js"></script>
</html>

    <body>

    <script>
        const url = window.location.pathname;
        const id = url.split("/")[2];
        const generate= document.getElementById("generate");
        const qrcodebox = document.querySelector('.body-qr');
        function renderTicket(ticket) {
            const ticketInfo = document.getElementById("ticket-info");
            for (let key in ticket) {
                const div = document.createElement("div");
                div.className = "ticket-info-column";
                div.innerHTML = ticket[key];
                ticketInfo.appendChild(div);
            }
        }

        fetch(`/ticket/${id}`, {
            method: "GET",
        })
        .then(response => {
            return(response.text());
        })
        .then(data => {
            const ticket = JSON.parse(data)[0];
            renderTicket(ticket);
        })

        function cancel() {
            fetch(`/own/${id}`, {
                method: "DELETE",
                headers: {
                    "Content-Type": "text/html"
                },
                body: `ticket_id=${id}`
            })
            .then(response => {
                return(response.status);
            })
            .then(status => {
                if (status == 200) {
                    window.location.replace("http://localhost:8001/inventory");
                }
                else {
                    alert("Error");
                }
            });
        }

        function exchange() {

        }

        function print() {

        }
        //tao ma qr

            qrcodebox.innerHTML="1";
            new QRCode(qrcodebox,{
                text:"haha",
                height:"30px",
                width:"30px",
                colorLight:"#fff",
                colorDark:"#000"
            });

        }

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
    <body>
        <div id="ticket-info"></div>
        <div>
            <button type="button" onclick="cancel()">Cancel</button>
            <button type="button" onclick="exchange()">Exchange</button>
            <button type="button" onclick="print()">Exchange</button>

    </body>
    <script>
        const url = window.location.pathname;
        const id = url.split("/")[2];
        const generate= document.getElementById('generate');
        const qrcodebox = document.querySelector('.body_qr');
        function renderTicket(ticket) {
            const ticketInfo = document.getElementById("ticket-info");
            for (let key in ticket) {
                const div = document.createElement("div");
                div.className = "ticket-info-column";
                div.innerHTML = ticket[key];
                ticketInfo.appendChild(div);
            }
        }

        fetch(`/ticket/${id}`, {
            method: "GET",
        })
        .then(response => {
            return(response.text());
        })
        .then(data => {
            const ticket = JSON.parse(data)[0];
            renderTicket(ticket);
        })

        function cancel() {
            fetch(`/own/${id}`, {
                method: "DELETE",
                headers: {
                    "Content-Type": "text/html"
                },
                body: `ticket_id=${id}`
            })
            .then(response => {
                return(response.status);
            })
            .then(status => {
                if (status == 200) {
                    window.location.replace("http://localhost:8001/inventory");
                }
                else {
                    alert("Error");
                }
            });
        }

        function exchange() {

        }

        function print() {

        }
        //tao ma qr
        generate.addEventListener('click',(e)=>{
            e.preventDefault();
            generateQRCode();
        });
        
        function generateQRCode(){
            
            qrcodebox.innerHTML="";
            new QRCode(qrcodebox,{
                text:"haha",
                height:100,
                width:100,
                colorLight:"#fff",
                colorDark:"#000"
            });

        }
    
    </script>

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
    <body>
        <div id="ticket-info"></div>
        <div>
            <button type="button" onclick="cancel()">Cancel</button>
            <button type="button" onclick="exchange()">Exchange</button>
            <button type="button" onclick="print()">Exchange</button>
            <button type="button" id="generate" >QRcode</button>
        </div>
        <div class="body_qr"></div>
        <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/qrcodejs/1.0.0/qrcode.min.js"></script>
    </body>
    <script>
        const url = window.location.pathname;
        const id = url.split("/")[2];
        const generate= document.getElementById('generate');
        const qrcodebox = document.querySelector('.body_qr');
        function renderTicket(ticket) {
            const ticketInfo = document.getElementById("ticket-info");
            for (let key in ticket) {
                const div = document.createElement("div");
                div.className = "ticket-info-column";
                div.innerHTML = ticket[key];
                ticketInfo.appendChild(div);
            }
        }

        fetch(`/ticket/${id}`, {
            method: "GET",
        })
        .then(response => {
            return(response.text());
        })
        .then(data => {
            const ticket = JSON.parse(data)[0];
            renderTicket(ticket);
        })

        function cancel() {
            fetch(`/own/${id}`, {
                method: "DELETE",
                headers: {
                    "Content-Type": "text/html"
                },
                body: `ticket_id=${id}`
            })
            .then(response => {
                return(response.status);
            })
            .then(status => {
                if (status == 200) {
                    window.location.replace("http://localhost:8001/inventory");
                }
                else {
                    alert("Error");
                }
            });
        }

        function exchange() {

        }

        function print() {

        }
        //tao ma qr
        generate.addEventListener('click',(e)=>{
            e.preventDefault();
            fetch(`/ticket/${id}`, {
            method: "GET",
        })
        .then(response => {
            return(response.text());
        })
        .then(data => {
            const ticket = JSON.parse(data)[0];
            generateQRCode(ticket);
        })
          
        });
        
        function generateQRCode(ticket){
            
            qrcodebox.innerHTML="";
            new QRCode(qrcodebox,{
                text:ticket,
                height:100,
                width:100,
                colorLight:"#fff",
                colorDark:"#000"
            });

        }
    
    </script>

            <button type="button" onclick="print()">Exchange</button>

        const url = window.location.pathname;
        const id = url.split("/")[2];
        const generate= document.getElementById('generate');
        const qrcodebox = document.querySelector('.body_qr');
        function renderTicket(ticket) {
            const ticketInfo = document.getElementById("ticket-info");
            for (let key in ticket) {
                const div = document.createElement("div");
                div.className = "ticket-info-column";
                div.innerHTML = ticket[key];
                ticketInfo.appendChild(div);
            }
        }

        fetch(`/ticket/${id}`, {
            method: "GET",
        })
        .then(response => {
            return(response.text());
        })
        .then(data => {
            const ticket = JSON.parse(data)[0];
            alert(ticket);
            renderTicket(ticket);
        })

        function cancel() {
            fetch(`/own/${id}`, {
                method: "DELETE",
                headers: {
                    "Content-Type": "text/html"
                },
                body: `ticket_id=${id}`
            })
            .then(response => {
                return(response.status);
            })
            .then(status => {
                if (status == 200) {
                    window.location.replace("http://localhost:8001/inventory");
                }
                else {

                }
            });

        function exchange() {

        }

        function print() {

        }
        //tao ma qr
        generate.addEventListener('click',(e)=>{
            e.preventDefault();
            fetch(`/ticket/${id}`, {
            method: "GET",
        })
        .then(response => {
            return(response.text());
        })
        .then(data => {
            const ticket = JSON.parse(data)[0];
            generateQRCode(ticket);
        })
          
        });

                height:100,
                width:100,
                colorLight:"#fff",
                colorDark:"#000"
            });

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="../static/index.css">
    <body>
        <h1>hello <span id="username"></span></h1>

        <a href="http://localhost:8001/login" class="auth">login</a>
        <a href="http://localhost:8001/register" class="auth">register</a>
        <a href="http://localhost:8001/inventory" class="nav">inventory</a>
        <a href="http://localhost:8001" onclick="logout()" class="nav">logout</a>

        <div id="tickets-info">
            <div id="tickets-search">
                <input type="text" name="from" id="from" placeholder="From">
                <input type="text" name="to" id="to" placeholder="To">
                <input type="airline" name="airline" id="airline" placeholder="Airline">
                <input type="datetime-local" name="datetime" id="datetime">
                <button type="button" onclick="filter()">Filter</button>
            </div>
            <div id="tickets-column">
                <span>Flight</span>
                <span>From</span>
                <span>To</span>
                <span>Date</span>
                <span>Time</span>
                <span>Airline</span>
                <span>Ticket</span>
                <span>Seat</span>
                <span>Price</span>
            </div>
            <ul id="tickets"></ul>
        </div>

    </body>

    <script>
        let tickets = [];
        let filteredTickets = [];

        // hien thi elements tuy thuoc vao trang thai dang nhap
        let username = localStorage.getItem("username");
        let authElements = document.querySelectorAll(".auth");
        let navElements = document.querySelectorAll(".nav");
        if (username != null) {
            document.getElementById("username").innerHTML = username;
            authElements.forEach(item => item.style.display = "none");
            navElements.forEach(item => item.style.display = "block");
        }
        else {
            authElements.forEach(item => item.style.display = "block");
            navElements.forEach(item => item.style.display = "none");
        }

        // xoa data nguoi dung duoc luu trong ls
        function logout() {
            localStorage.clear();
        }

        function filter() {
            let from = document.getElementById("from").value;
            let to = document.getElementById("to").value;
            let airline = document.getElementById("airline").value;
            let datetime= document.getElementById("datetime").value;
            filteredTickets = tickets;
            console.log(`from: ${from}, to: ${to}, datetime: ${datetime}`);
            if (from != "") {
                filteredTickets = filteredTickets.filter(flight => 
                    flight.from.includes(from));
            }
            if (to != "") {
                filteredTickets = filteredTickets.filter(flight => 
                    flight.to.includes(to));
            }
            if (airline != "") {
                filteredTickets = filteredTickets.filter(flight => 
                    flight.airline.includes(airline));
            }
            if (datetime != "") {
                filteredTickets = filteredTickets.filter(flight => 
                    Date.parse(datetime)== Date.parse(`${flight.date}T${flight.time}:00`));
            }
            renderTickets();
        }

        function renderTickets() {
            const ul = document.getElementById("tickets");
            ul.innerHTML = ""; // xoa cac element da co de them tu dau
            filteredTickets.forEach(ticket => {
                const li = document.createElement("li");
                li.className = "ticket";
                for (const key in ticket) {
                    const span = document.createElement("span");
                    span.textContent = ticket[key];
                    li.appendChild(span);
                }
                const a = document.createElement("a");
                a.setAttribute("href", `http://localhost:8001/buy/${ticket.ticket_id}`);
                a.innerHTML = "Buy";
                li.appendChild(a);
                ul.appendChild(li);
            });
        }

        fetch("/tickets", {
            method: "GET",
        })
        .then(response => {
            return(response.text());
        })
        .then(data => {
            tickets = JSON.parse(data);
            filteredTickets = tickets;
            renderTickets();
        })
    </script>
</html>

HTTP/1.1 200 OK

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="../static/inventory.css">
    <body>
        <h1><span id="username"></span>'s tickets</h1>

        <a href="http://localhost:8001">home</a>

        <div id="tickets-info">
            <div id="tickets-search">
                <input type="text" name="from" id="from" placeholder="From">
                <input type="text" name="to" id="to" placeholder="To">
                <input type="airline" name="airline" id="airline" placeholder="Airline">
                <input type="datetime-local" name="datetime" id="datetime">
                <button type="button" onclick="filter()">Filter</button>
            </div>
            <div id="tickets-column">
                <span>Flight</span>
                <span>From</span>
                <span>To</span>
                <span>Date</span>
                <span>Time</span>
                <span>Airline</span>
                <span>Ticket</span>
                <span>Seat</span>
                <span>Price</span>
            </div>
            <ul id="tickets"></ul>
        </div>
    </body>
    <script>
        const username = localStorage.getItem("username");
        if (username == null) {
            window.location = "http://localhost:8001/login"
        }
        document.getElementById("username").innerHTML = username;
        
        let tickets = [];
        let filteredTickets = [];

        function filter() {
            let from = document.getElementById("from").value;
            let to = document.getElementById("to").value;
            let airline = document.getElementById("airline").value;
            let datetime= document.getElementById("datetime").value;
            filteredTickets = tickets;
            console.log(`from: ${from}, to: ${to}, datetime: ${datetime}`);
            if (from != "") {
                filteredTickets = filteredTickets.filter(flight => 
                    flight.from.includes(from));
            }
            if (to != "") {
                filteredTickets = filteredTickets.filter(flight => 
                    flight.to.includes(to));
            }
            if (airline != "") {
                filteredTickets = filteredTickets.filter(flight => 
                    flight.airline.includes(airline));
            }
            if (datetime != "") {
                filteredTickets = filteredTickets.filter(flight => 
                    Date.parse(datetime)== Date.parse(`${flight.date}T${flight.time}:00`));
            }
            renderTickets();
        }

        function renderTickets() {
            const ul = document.getElementById("tickets");
            ul.innerHTML = ""; // xoa cac element da co de them tu dau
            filteredTickets.forEach(ticket => {
                const li = document.createElement("li");
                li.className = "ticket";
                for (const key in ticket) {
                    const span = document.createElement("span");
                    span.textContent = ticket[key];
                    li.appendChild(span);
                }
                const a = document.createElement("a");
                a.setAttribute("href", `http://localhost:8001/info/${ticket.ticket_id}`);
                a.innerHTML = "Info";
                li.appendChild(a);
                ul.appendChild(li);
            });
        }

        fetch(`/inventory/${username}`, {
            method: "GET",
        })
        .then(response => {
            return(response.text());
        })
        .then(data => {
            tickets = JSON.parse(data);
            filteredTickets = tickets;
            renderTickets();
        })
    </script>
</html>

Mon Jan  1 01:10:56 2024

HTTP/1.1 200 OK

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
    <body>
        <div id="ticket-info"></div>
        <div>
            <button type="button" onclick="cancel()">Cancel</button>
            <button type="button" onclick="exchange()">Exchange</button>
            <button type="button" onclick="print()">Exchange</button>
            <button type="button" id="generate" >QRcode</button>
        </div>
        <div class="body_qr"></div>
        <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/qrcodejs/1.0.0/qrcode.min.js"></script>
    </body>
    <script>
        const url = window.location.pathname;
        const id = url.split("/")[2];
        const generate= document.getElementById('generate');
        const qrcodebox = document.querySelector('.body_qr');
        function renderTicket(ticket) {
            const ticketInfo = document.getElementById("ticket-info");
            for (let key in ticket) {
                const div = document.createElement("div");
                div.className = "ticket-info-column";
                div.innerHTML = ticket[key];
                ticketInfo.appendChild(div);
            }
        }

        fetch(`/ticket/${id}`, {
            method: "GET",
        })
        .then(response => {
            return(response.text());
        })
        .then(data => {
            const ticket = JSON.parse(data)[0];
            renderTicket(ticket);
        })

        function cancel() {
            fetch(`/own/${id}`, {
                method: "DELETE",
                headers: {
                    "Content-Type": "text/html"
                },
                body: `ticket_id=${id}`
            })
            .then(response => {
                return(response.status);
            })
            .then(status => {
                if (status == 200) {
                    window.location.replace("http://localhost:8001/inventory");
                }
                else {
                    alert("Error");
                }
            });
        }

        function exchange() {

        }

        function print() {

        }
        //tao ma qr

        generate.addEventListener('click',(e)=>{
            e.preventDefault();
            generateQRCode();          
        });
        function textGen(ticket){
            var qrInfo='';
            for (let key in ticket) {
               
                qrInfo =qrInfo + ticket[key];
              
            }
            generateQRCode(qrInfo);
        }        
        function generateQRCode(qrInfo){
            
            qrcodebox.innerHTML="";
            new QRCode(qrcodebox,{
                text:qrInfo,
                height:100,
                width:100,
                colorLight:"#fff",
                colorDark:"#000"
            });

        }
    
    </script>
    
</html>

HTTP/1.1 200 OK

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
    <body>
        <div id="ticket-info"></div>
        <div>
            <button type="button" onclick="cancel()">Cancel</button>
            <button type="button" onclick="exchange()">Exchange</button>
            <button type="button" onclick="print()">Exchange</button>
            <button type="button" id="generate" >QRcode</button>
        </div>
        <div class="body_qr"></div>
        <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/qrcodejs/1.0.0/qrcode.min.js"></script>
    </body>
    <script>
        const url = window.location.pathname;
        const id = url.split("/")[2];
        const generate= document.getElementById('generate');
        const qrcodebox = document.querySelector('.body_qr');
        function renderTicket(ticket) {
            const ticketInfo = document.getElementById("ticket-info");
            for (let key in ticket) {
                const div = document.createElement("div");
                div.className = "ticket-info-column";
                div.innerHTML = ticket[key];
                ticketInfo.appendChild(div);
            }
        }
        const ticket=null;
        fetch(`/ticket/${id}`, {
            method: "GET",
        })
        .then(response => {
            return(response.text());
        })
        .then(data => {
            ticket = JSON.parse(data)[0];
            renderTicket(ticket);
        })

        function cancel() {
            fetch(`/own/${id}`, {
                method: "DELETE",
                headers: {
                    "Content-Type": "text/html"
                },
                body: `ticket_id=${id}`
            })
            .then(response => {
                return(response.status);
            })
            .then(status => {
                if (status == 200) {
                    window.location.replace("http://localhost:8001/inventory");
                }
                else {
                    alert("Error");
                }
            });
        }

        function exchange() {

        }

        function print() {

        }
        //tao ma qr

        generate.addEventListener('click',(e)=>{
            e.preventDefault();
            te;          
        });
        function textGen(ticket){
            var qrInfo='';
            for (let key in ticket) {
               
                qrInfo =qrInfo + ticket[key];
              
            }
            generateQRCode(qrInfo);
        }        
        function generateQRCode(qrInfo){
            
            qrcodebox.innerHTML="";
            new QRCode(qrcodebox,{
                text:qrInfo,
                height:100,
                width:100,
                colorLight:"#fff",
                colorDark:"#000"
            });

        }
    
    </script>
    
</html>

Host: localhost:8001

Mon Jan  1 01:13:40 2024

HTTP/1.1 200 OK

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
    <body>
        <div id="ticket-info"></div>
        <div>
            <button type="button" onclick="cancel()">Cancel</button>
            <button type="button" onclick="exchange()">Exchange</button>
            <button type="button" onclick="print()">Exchange</button>
            <button type="button" id="generate" >QRcode</button>
        </div>
        <div class="body_qr"></div>
        <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/qrcodejs/1.0.0/qrcode.min.js"></script>
    </body>
    <script>
        const url = window.location.pathname;
        const id = url.split("/")[2];
        const generate= document.getElementById('generate');
        const qrcodebox = document.querySelector('.body_qr');
        function renderTicket(ticket) {
            const ticketInfo = document.getElementById("ticket-info");
            for (let key in ticket) {
                const div = document.createElement("div");
                div.className = "ticket-info-column";
                div.innerHTML = ticket[key];
                ticketInfo.appendChild(div);
            }
        }
        const ticket=null;
        fetch(`/ticket/${id}`, {
            method: "GET",
        })
        .then(response => {
            return(response.text());
        })
        .then(data => {
            ticket = JSON.parse(data)[0];
            renderTicket(ticket);
        })

        function cancel() {
            fetch(`/own/${id}`, {
                method: "DELETE",
                headers: {
                    "Content-Type": "text/html"
                },
                body: `ticket_id=${id}`
            })
            .then(response => {
                return(response.status);
            })
            .then(status => {
                if (status == 200) {
                    window.location.replace("http://localhost:8001/inventory");
                }
                else {
                    alert("Error");
                }
            });
        }

        function exchange() {

        }

        function print() {

        }
        //tao ma qr

        generate.addEventListener('click',(e)=>{
            e.preventDefault();
            te;          
        });
        function textGen(ticket){
            var qrInfo='';
            for (let key in ticket) {
               
                qrInfo =qrInfo + ticket[key];
              
            }
            generateQRCode(qrInfo);
        }        
        function generateQRCode(qrInfo){
            
            qrcodebox.innerHTML="";
            new QRCode(qrcodebox,{
                text:qrInfo,
                height:100,
                width:100,
                colorLight:"#fff",
                colorDark:"#000"
            });

        }
    
    </script>
    
</html>

Mon Jan  1 01:14:05 2024

HTTP/1.1 200 OK

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
    <body>
        <div id="ticket-info"></div>
        <div>
            <button type="button" onclick="cancel()">Cancel</button>
            <button type="button" onclick="exchange()">Exchange</button>
            <button type="button" onclick="print()">Exchange</button>
            <button type="button" id="generate" >QRcode</button>
        </div>
        <div class="body_qr"></div>
        <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/qrcodejs/1.0.0/qrcode.min.js"></script>
    </body>
    <script>
        const url = window.location.pathname;
        const id = url.split("/")[2];
        const generate= document.getElementById('generate');
        const qrcodebox = document.querySelector('.body_qr');
        function renderTicket(ticket) {
            const ticketInfo = document.getElementById("ticket-info");
            for (let key in ticket) {
                const div = document.createElement("div");
                div.className = "ticket-info-column";
                div.innerHTML = ticket[key];
                ticketInfo.appendChild(div);
            }
        }
        const ticket="haha";
        fetch(`/ticket/${id}`, {
            method: "GET",
        })
        .then(response => {
            return(response.text());
        })
        .then(data => {
            ticket = JSON.parse(data)[0];
            renderTicket(ticket);
        })

        function cancel() {
            fetch(`/own/${id}`, {
                method: "DELETE",
                headers: {
                    "Content-Type": "text/html"
                },
                body: `ticket_id=${id}`
            })
            .then(response => {
                return(response.status);
            })
            .then(status => {
                if (status == 200) {
                    window.location.replace("http://localhost:8001/inventory");
                }
                else {
                    alert("Error");
                }
            });
        }

        function exchange() {

        }

        function print() {

        }
        //tao ma qr

        generate.addEventListener('click',(e)=>{
            e.preventDefault();
            te;          
        });
        function textGen(ticket){
            var qrInfo='';
            for (let key in ticket) {
               
                qrInfo =qrInfo + ticket[key];
              
            }
            generateQRCode(qrInfo);
        }        
        function generateQRCode(qrInfo){
            
            qrcodebox.innerHTML="";
            new QRCode(qrcodebox,{
                text:qrInfo,
                height:100,
                width:100,
                colorLight:"#fff",
                colorDark:"#000"
            });

        }
    
    </script>
    
</html>

    <script>
        const url = window.location.pathname;
        const id = url.split("/")[2];
        const generate= document.getElementById('generate');
        const qrcodebox = document.querySelector('.body_qr');
        function renderTicket(ticket) {
            const ticketInfo = document.getElementById("ticket-info");
            for (let key in ticket) {
                const div = document.createElement("div");
                div.className = "ticket-info-column";
                div.innerHTML = ticket[key];
                ticketInfo.appendChild(div);
            }
        }
        const ticket="haha";
        fetch(`/ticket/${id}`, {
            method: "GET",
        })
        .then(response => {
            return(response.text());
        })
        .then(data => {
            ticket = JSON.parse(data)[0];
            renderTicket(ticket);
        })

        function cancel() {
            fetch(`/own/${id}`, {
                method: "DELETE",
                headers: {
                    "Content-Type": "text/html"
                },
                body: `ticket_id=${id}`
            })

                    window.location.replace("http://localhost:8001/inventory");

                else {

                }
            });

        }

        function print() {

        }
        //tao ma qr

        generate.addEventListener('click',(e)=>{
            e.preventDefault();
            te;          
        });
        function textGen(ticket){
            var qrInfo='';
            for (let key in ticket) {
               
                qrInfo =qrInfo + ticket[key];

        }

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
    <body>
        <div id="ticket-info"></div>
        <div>
            <button type="button" onclick="cancel()">Cancel</button>
            <button type="button" onclick="exchange()">Exchange</button>
            <button type="button" onclick="print()">Exchange</button>
            <button type="button" id="generate" >QRcode</button>
        </div>
        <div class="body_qr"></div>
        <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/qrcodejs/1.0.0/qrcode.min.js"></script>
    </body>
    <script>
        const url = window.location.pathname;
        const id = url.split("/")[2];
        const generate= document.getElementById('generate');
        const qrcodebox = document.querySelector('.body_qr');
        function renderTicket(ticket) {
            const ticketInfo = document.getElementById("ticket-info");
            for (let key in ticket) {
                const div = document.createElement("div");
                div.className = "ticket-info-column";
                div.innerHTML = ticket[key];
                ticketInfo.appendChild(div);
            }
        }
        fetch(`/ticket/${id}`, {
            method: "GET",
        })
        .then(response => {
            return(response.text());
        })
        .then(data => {
            const ticket = JSON.parse(data)[0];
            renderTicket(ticket);
        })

        function cancel() {
            fetch(`/own/${id}`, {
                method: "DELETE",
                headers: {
                    "Content-Type": "text/html"
                },
                body: `ticket_id=${id}`
            })
            .then(response => {
                return(response.status);
            })
            .then(status => {
                if (status == 200) {
                    window.location.replace("http://localhost:8001/inventory");
                }
                else {
                    alert("Error");
                }
            });
        }

        function exchange() {

        }

        function print() {

        }
        //tao ma qr

        generate.addEventListener('click',(e)=>{
            e.preventDefault();
            te;          
        });
        function textGen(ticket){
            var qrInfo='';
            for (let key in ticket) {
               
                qrInfo =qrInfo + ticket[key];
              
            }
            generateQRCode(qrInfo);
        }        
        function generateQRCode(qrInfo){
            
            qrcodebox.innerHTML="";
            new QRCode(qrcodebox,{
                text:qrInfo,
                height:100,
                width:100,
                colorLight:"#fff",
                colorDark:"#000"

Mon Jan  1 01:15:45 2024

HTTP/1.1 200 OK

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
    <body>
        <div id="ticket-info"></div>
        <div>
            <button type="button" onclick="cancel()">Cancel</button>
            <button type="button" onclick="exchange()">Exchange</button>
            <button type="button" onclick="print()">Exchange</button>
            <button type="button" id="generate" >QRcode</button>
        </div>
        <div class="body_qr"></div>
        <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/qrcodejs/1.0.0/qrcode.min.js"></script>
    </body>
    <script>
        const url = window.location.pathname;
        const id = url.split("/")[2];
        const generate= document.getElementById('generate');
        const qrcodebox = document.querySelector('.body_qr');
        function renderTicket(ticket) {
            const ticketInfo = document.getElementById("ticket-info");
            for (let key in ticket) {
                const div = document.createElement("div");
                div.className = "ticket-info-column";
                div.innerHTML = ticket[key];
                ticketInfo.appendChild(div);
            }
        }
        fetch(`/ticket/${id}`, {
            method: "GET",
        })
        .then(response => {
            return(response.text());
        })
        .then(data => {
            const ticket = JSON.parse(data)[0];
            renderTicket(ticket);
            textGen(ticket);
        })

        function cancel() {
            fetch(`/own/${id}`, {
                method: "DELETE",
                headers: {
                    "Content-Type": "text/html"
                },
                body: `ticket_id=${id}`
            })
            .then(response => {
                return(response.status);
            })
            .then(status => {
                if (status == 200) {
                    window.location.replace("http://localhost:8001/inventory");
                }
                else {
                    alert("Error");
                }
            });
        }

        function exchange() {

        }

        function print() {

        }
        //tao ma qr

        generate.addEventListener('click',(e)=>{
            e.preventDefault();
            te;          
        });
        var qrInfo='';
        function textGen(ticket){
            
            for (let key in ticket) {
               
                qrInfo =qrInfo + ticket[key];
              
            }
        }        
        alert(qrInfo);
        function generateQRCode(qrInfo){
            
            qrcodebox.innerHTML="";
            new QRCode(qrcodebox,{
                text:qrInfo,
                height:100,
                width:100,
                colorLight:"#fff",
                colorDark:"#000"
            });

        }
    
    </script>
    
</html>

Mon Jan  1 01:15:48 2024

HTTP/1.1 200 OK

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
    <body>
        <div id="ticket-info"></div>
        <div>
            <button type="button" onclick="cancel()">Cancel</button>
            <button type="button" onclick="exchange()">Exchange</button>
            <button type="button" onclick="print()">Exchange</button>
            <button type="button" id="generate" >QRcode</button>
        </div>
        <div class="body_qr"></div>
        <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/qrcodejs/1.0.0/qrcode.min.js"></script>
    </body>
    <script>
        const url = window.location.pathname;
        const id = url.split("/")[2];
        const generate= document.getElementById('generate');
        const qrcodebox = document.querySelector('.body_qr');
        function renderTicket(ticket) {
            const ticketInfo = document.getElementById("ticket-info");
            for (let key in ticket) {
                const div = document.createElement("div");
                div.className = "ticket-info-column";
                div.innerHTML = ticket[key];
                ticketInfo.appendChild(div);
            }
        }
        fetch(`/ticket/${id}`, {
            method: "GET",
        })
        .then(response => {
            return(response.text());
        })
        .then(data => {
            const ticket = JSON.parse(data)[0];
            renderTicket(ticket);
            textGen(ticket);
        })

        function cancel() {
            fetch(`/own/${id}`, {
                method: "DELETE",
                headers: {
                    "Content-Type": "text/html"
                },
                body: `ticket_id=${id}`
            })
            .then(response => {
                return(response.status);
            })
            .then(status => {
                if (status == 200) {
                    window.location.replace("http://localhost:8001/inventory");
                }
                else {
                    alert("Error");
                }
            });
        }

        function exchange() {

        }

        function print() {

        }
        //tao ma qr

        generate.addEventListener('click',(e)=>{
            e.preventDefault();
            te;          
        });
        var qrInfo='';
        function textGen(ticket){
            
            for (let key in ticket) {
               
                qrInfo =qrInfo + ticket[key];
              
            }
        }        
        alert(qrInfo);
        function generateQRCode(qrInfo){
            
            qrcodebox.innerHTML="";
            new QRCode(qrcodebox,{
                text:qrInfo,
                height:100,
                width:100,
                colorLight:"#fff",
                colorDark:"#000"
            });

        }
    
    </script>
    
</html>

HTTP/1.1 200 OK

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
    <body>
        <div id="ticket-info"></div>
        <div>
            <button type="button" onclick="cancel()">Cancel</button>
            <button type="button" onclick="exchange()">Exchange</button>
            <button type="button" onclick="print()">Exchange</button>
            <button type="button" id="generate" >QRcode</button>
        </div>
        <div class="body_qr"></div>
        <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/qrcodejs/1.0.0/qrcode.min.js"></script>
    </body>
    <script>
        const url = window.location.pathname;
        const id = url.split("/")[2];
        const generate= document.getElementById('generate');
        const qrcodebox = document.querySelector('.body_qr');
        function renderTicket(ticket) {
            const ticketInfo = document.getElementById("ticket-info");
            for (let key in ticket) {
                const div = document.createElement("div");
                div.className = "ticket-info-column";
                div.innerHTML = ticket[key];
                ticketInfo.appendChild(div);
            }
        }
        fetch(`/ticket/${id}`, {
            method: "GET",
        })
        .then(response => {
            return(response.text());
        })
        .then(data => {
            const ticket = JSON.parse(data)[0];
            renderTicket(ticket);
            textGen(ticket);
        })

        function cancel() {
            fetch(`/own/${id}`, {
                method: "DELETE",
                headers: {
                    "Content-Type": "text/html"
                },
                body: `ticket_id=${id}`
            })
            .then(response => {
                return(response.status);
            })
            .then(status => {
                if (status == 200) {
                    window.location.replace("http://localhost:8001/inventory");
                }
                else {
                    alert("Error");
                }
            });
        }

        function exchange() {

        }

        function print() {

        }
        //tao ma qr

        generate.addEventListener('click',(e)=>{
            e.preventDefault();
            te;          
        });
        var qrInfo='';
        function textGen(ticket){
            
            for (let key in ticket) {
               
                qrInfo =qrInfo + ticket[key];
              
            }
        }        
        alert(qrInfo);
        function generateQRCode(qrInfo){
            
            qrcodebox.innerHTML="";
            new QRCode(qrcodebox,{
                text:qrInfo,
                height:100,
                width:100,
                colorLight:"#fff",
                colorDark:"#000"
            });

        }
    
    </script>
    
</html>

    <body>
        <div id="ticket-info"></div>

            <button type="button" onclick="exchange()">Exchange</button>
            <button type="button" onclick="print()">Exchange</button>

    </body>
    <script>
        const url = window.location.pathname;
        const id = url.split("/")[2];
        const generate= document.getElementById('generate');
        const qrcodebox = document.querySelector('.body_qr');
        function renderTicket(ticket) {
            const ticketInfo = document.getElementById("ticket-info");
            for (let key in ticket) {
                const div = document.createElement("div");
                div.className = "ticket-info-column";
                div.innerHTML = ticket[key];
                ticketInfo.appendChild(div);
            }
        }
        fetch(`/ticket/${id}`, {
            method: "GET",
        })
        .then(response => {
            return(response.text());
        })
        .then(data => {
            const ticket = JSON.parse(data)[0];
            renderTicket(ticket);
            textGen(ticket);
        })

        function cancel() {
            fetch(`/own/${id}`, {
                method: "DELETE",
                headers: {
                    "Content-Type": "text/html"
                },
                body: `ticket_id=${id}`
            })
            .then(response => {
                return(response.status);
            })
            .then(status => {
                if (status == 200) {
                    window.location.replace("http://localhost:8001/inventory");
                }
                else {
                    alert("Error");
                }
            });
        }

        function exchange() {

        }

        function print() {

        }
        //tao ma qr

        generate.addEventListener('click',(e)=>{
            e.preventDefault();
            te;          
        });
        var qrInfo='';
        function textGen(ticket){
            
            for (let key in ticket) {
               
                qrInfo =qrInfo + ticket[key];
              
            }
        }        
        alert(qrInfo);

                width:100,
                colorLight:"#fff",
                colorDark:"#000"

        const generate= document.getElementById('generate');

        const id = url.split("/")[2];
        const generate= document.getElementById('generate');
        const qrcodebox = document.querySelector('.body_qr');
        function renderTicket(ticket) {
            const ticketInfo = document.getElementById("ticket-info");
            for (let key in ticket) {
                const div = document.createElement("div");
                div.className = "ticket-info-column";
                div.innerHTML = ticket[key];
                ticketInfo.appendChild(div);
            }
        }
        fetch(`/ticket/${id}`, {
            method: "GET",
        })
        .then(response => {
            return(response.text());
        })
        .then(data => {
            const ticket = JSON.parse(data)[0];
            renderTicket(ticket);
            textGen(ticket);
        })

        function cancel() {
            fetch(`/own/${id}`, {
                method: "DELETE",
                headers: {
                    "Content-Type": "text/html"
                },

            e.preventDefault();
            te;          
        });
        var qrInfo='2';
        function textGen(ticket,qrInfo){
            
            for (let key in ticket) {
               
                qrInfo =qrInfo + ticket[key];
              
            }
        }        
        console.log(qrInfo);
        function generateQRCode(qrInfo){
            
            qrcodebox.innerHTML="";

            <button type="button" onclick="exchange()">Exchange</button>
            <button type="button" onclick="print()">Exchange</button>
            <button type="button" id="generate" >QRcode</button>
        </div>
        <div class="body_qr"></div>
        <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/qrcodejs/1.0.0/qrcode.min.js"></script>
    </body>
    <script>
        const url = window.location.pathname;
        const id = url.split("/")[2];
        const generate= document.getElementById('generate');
        const qrcodebox = document.querySelector('.body_qr');
        function renderTicket(ticket) {
            const ticketInfo = document.getElementById("ticket-info");
            for (let key in ticket) {
                const div = document.createElement("div");
                div.className = "ticket-info-column";
                div.innerHTML = ticket[key];
                ticketInfo.appendChild(div);
            }
        }
        fetch(`/ticket/${id}`, {
            method: "GET",
        })
        .then(response => {
            return(response.text());
        })
        .then(data => {
            const ticket = JSON.parse(data)[0];
            renderTicket(ticket);
            textGen(ticket);
        })

        function cancel() {
            fetch(`/own/${id}`, {
                method: "DELETE",
                headers: {
                    "Content-Type": "text/html"
                },
                body: `ticket_id=${id}`
            })
            .then(response => {
                return(response.status);
            })
            .then(status => {
                if (status == 200) {
                    window.location.replace("http://localhost:8001/inventory");
                }
                else {
                    alert("Error");
                }
            });
        }

        function exchange() {

        }

        function print() {

        }
        //tao ma qr

        
        var qrInfo='';
        function textGen(ticket,qrInfo){
            
            for (let key in ticket) {
               
                qrInfo =qrInfo + ticket[key];
              
            }
        }        
        console.log(qrInfo);
        generate.addEventListener('click',(e)=>{
            e.preventDefault();
            generateQRCode(qrInfo)     
        });
        function generateQRCode(qrInfo){
            
            qrcodebox.innerHTML="";
            new QRCode(qrcodebox,{
                text:qrInfo,
                height:100,
                width:100,
                colorLight:"#fff",
                colorDark:"#000"
            });

        }
    
    </script>
    
</html>

        const url = window.location.pathname;
        const id = url.split("/")[2];
        const generate= document.getElementById('generate');
        const qrcodebox = document.querySelector('.body_qr');
        function renderTicket(ticket) {
            const ticketInfo = document.getElementById("ticket-info");
            for (let key in ticket) {
                const div = document.createElement("div");
                div.className = "ticket-info-column";
                div.innerHTML = ticket[key];
                ticketInfo.appendChild(div);
            }
        }
        fetch(`/ticket/${id}`, {
            method: "GET",
        })
        .then(response => {
            return(response.text());
        })
        .then(data => {
            const ticket = JSON.parse(data)[0];
            renderTicket(ticket);
            textGen(ticket);
        })

        function cancel() {
            fetch(`/own/${id}`, {
                method: "DELETE",
                headers: {
                    "Content-Type": "text/html"
                },
                body: `ticket_id=${id}`
            })
            .then(response => {
                return(response.status);

            .then(status => {
                if (status == 200) {
                    window.location.replace("http://localhost:8001/inventory");

                else {

                }
            });

        }

        function print() {

        }
        //tao ma qr

        function textGen(ticket,qrInfo){
            
            for (let key in ticket) {
               
                qrInfo =qrInfo + "2"
              
            }
        }        
        console.log(qrInfo);
        generate.addEventListener('click',(e)=>{
            e.preventDefault();
            generateQRCode(qrInfo)

                const div = document.createElement("div");
                div.className = "ticket-info-column";
                div.innerHTML = ticket[key];
                ticketInfo.appendChild(div);
            }
        }
        fetch(`/ticket/${id}`, {
            method: "GET",
        })
        .then(response => {
            return(response.text());
        })
        .then(data => {
            const ticket = JSON.parse(data)[0];
            renderTicket(ticket);
            textGen(ticket);
        })

        function cancel() {
            fetch(`/own/${id}`, {
                method: "DELETE",
                headers: {
                    "Content-Type": "text/html"
                },
                body: `ticket_id=${id}`
            })
            .then(response => {
                return(response.status);
            })
            .then(status => {
                if (status == 200) {
                    window.location.replace("http://localhost:8001/inventory");
                }
                else {
                    alert("Error");
                }
            });
        }

        function exchange() {

        }

        function print() {

        }
        //tao ma qr

        generate.addEventListener('click',(e)=>{
            e.preventDefault();
                      
        });
        var qrInfo='2';
        function textGen(ticket){
            
            for (let key in ticket) {
               
                qrInfo =qrInfo +"2";
              
            }
            return qrInfo;
        }
             
        console.log(textGen());
        function generateQRCode(qrInfo){
            
            qrcodebox.innerHTML="";
            new QRCode(qrcodebox,{
                text:qrInfo,
                height:100,
                width:100,
                colorLight:"#fff",
                colorDark:"#000"
            });

        }
    
    </script>
    
</html>

HTTP/1.1 200 OK

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
    <body>
        <div id="ticket-info"></div>
        <div>
            <button type="button" onclick="cancel()">Cancel</button>
            <button type="button" onclick="exchange()">Exchange</button>
            <button type="button" onclick="print()">Exchange</button>
            <button type="button" id="generate" >QRcode</button>
        </div>
        <div class="body_qr"></div>
        <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/qrcodejs/1.0.0/qrcode.min.js"></script>
    </body>
    <script>
        const url = window.location.pathname;
        const id = url.split("/")[2];
        const generate= document.getElementById('generate');
        const qrcodebox = document.querySelector('.body_qr');
        function renderTicket(ticket) {
            const ticketInfo = document.getElementById("ticket-info");
            for (let key in ticket) {
                const div = document.createElement("div");
                div.className = "ticket-info-column";
                div.innerHTML = ticket[key];
                ticketInfo.appendChild(div);
            }
        }
        fetch(`/ticket/${id}`, {
            method: "GET",
        })
        .then(response => {
            return(response.text());
        })
        .then(data => {
            const ticket = JSON.parse(data)[0];
            renderTicket(ticket);
            textGen(ticket);
        })

        function cancel() {
            fetch(`/own/${id}`, {
                method: "DELETE",
                headers: {
                    "Content-Type": "text/html"
                },
                body: `ticket_id=${id}`
            })
            .then(response => {
                return(response.status);
            })
            .then(status => {
                if (status == 200) {
                    window.location.replace("http://localhost:8001/inventory");
                }
                else {
                    alert("Error");
                }
            });
        }

        function exchange() {

        }

        function print() {

        }
        //tao ma qr

        generate.addEventListener('click',(e)=>{
            e.preventDefault();
                      
        });
        var qrInfo='2';
        function textGen(ticket){
            qrInfo =qrInfo+"3";
            for (let key in ticket) {
               
                qrInfo =qrInfo +"2";
              
            }
            return qrInfo;
        }
             
        console.log(textGen());
        function generateQRCode(qrInfo){
            
            qrcodebox.innerHTML="";
            new QRCode(qrcodebox,{
                text:qrInfo,
                height:100,
                width:100,
                colorLight:"#fff",
                colorDark:"#000"
            });

        }
    
    </script>

        const id = url.split("/")[2];
        const generate= document.getElementById('generate');
        const qrcodebox = document.querySelector('.body_qr');
        function renderTicket(ticket) {
            const ticketInfo = document.getElementById("ticket-info");
            for (let key in ticket) {
                const div = document.createElement("div");
                div.className = "ticket-info-column";
                div.innerHTML = ticket[key];
                ticketInfo.appendChild(div);
                console.log(ticket[key]);
            }
        }
        fetch(`/ticket/${id}`, {
            method: "GET",
        })
        .then(response => {
            return(response.text());
        })
        .then(data => {
            const ticket = JSON.parse(data)[0];
            renderTicket(ticket);
            textGen(ticket);
        })

        function cancel() {
            fetch(`/own/${id}`, {
                method: "DELETE",
                headers: {
                    "Content-Type": "text/html"
                },
                body: `ticket_id=${id}`
            })
            .then(response => {
                return(response.status);
            })
            .then(status => {
                if (status == 200) {
                    window.location.replace("http://localhost:8001/inventory");
                }
                else {
                    alert("Error");
                }
            });

        function exchange() {

        function print() {

        }

            e.preventDefault();
                      
        });

        function textGen(ticket){
           
            for (let key in ticket) {
               
                qrInfo =qrInfo +"2";
              
            }
            return qrInfo;

            return qrInfo;

                    "Content-Type": "text/html"
                },
                body: `ticket_id=${id}`
            })
            .then(response => {
                return(response.status);
            })
            .then(status => {
                if (status == 200) {
                    window.location.replace("http://localhost:8001/inventory");
                }
                else {
                    alert("Error");
                }
            });
        }

        function exchange() {

        }

        function print() {

        }
        //tao ma qr

        generate.addEventListener('click',(e)=>{
            e.preventDefault();
                      
        });
        var qrInfo='3';
        function textGen(ticket){
           
            for (let key in ticket) {
               
                qrInfo =qrInfo +tiket[key];
              
            }
            return qrInfo;
        }
             
        console.log(qrInfo);
        function generateQRCode(qrInfo){
            
            qrcodebox.innerHTML="";
            new QRCode(qrcodebox,{
                text:qrInfo,
                height:100,
                width:100,
                colorLight:"#fff",
                colorDark:"#000"
            });

        }
    
    </script>
    
</html>

Mon Jan  1 01:36:11 2024

HTTP/1.1 200 OK

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
    <body>
        <div id="ticket-info"></div>
        <div>
            <button type="button" onclick="cancel()">Cancel</button>
            <button type="button" onclick="exchange()">Exchange</button>
            <button type="button" onclick="print()">Exchange</button>
            <button type="button" id="generate" >QRcode</button>
        </div>
        <div class="body_qr"></div>
        <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/qrcodejs/1.0.0/qrcode.min.js"></script>
    </body>
    <script>
        const url = window.location.pathname;
        const id = url.split("/")[2];
        const generate= document.getElementById('generate');
        const qrcodebox = document.querySelector('.body_qr');
        function renderTicket(ticket) {
            const ticketInfo = document.getElementById("ticket-info");
            for (let key in ticket) {
                const div = document.createElement("div");
                div.className = "ticket-info-column";
                div.innerHTML = ticket[key];
                ticketInfo.appendChild(div);
                console.log(typeof ticket[key]);
            }
        }
        fetch(`/ticket/${id}`, {
            method: "GET",
        })
        .then(response => {
            return(response.text());
        })
        .then(data => {
            const ticket = JSON.parse(data)[0];
            renderTicket(ticket);
            textGen(ticket);
        })

        function cancel() {
            fetch(`/own/${id}`, {
                method: "DELETE",
                headers: {
                    "Content-Type": "text/html"
                },
                body: `ticket_id=${id}`
            })
            .then(response => {
                return(response.status);
            })
            .then(status => {
                if (status == 200) {
                    window.location.replace("http://localhost:8001/inventory");
                }
                else {
                    alert("Error");
                }
            });
        }

        function exchange() {

        }

        function print() {

        }
        //tao ma qr

        generate.addEventListener('click',(e)=>{
            e.preventDefault();
                      
        });
        var qrInfo='3';
        function textGen(ticket){
           
            for (let i=1;i<10;i++) {
               
                qrInfo =qrInfo+"1";
              
            }
            return qrInfo;
        }
             
        console.log(qrInfo);
        function generateQRCode(qrInfo){
            
            qrcodebox.innerHTML="";
            new QRCode(qrcodebox,{
                text:qrInfo,
                height:100,
                width:100,
                colorLight:"#fff",
                colorDark:"#000"
            });

        }
    
    </script>
    
</html>

        const id = url.split("/")[2];
        const generate= document.getElementById('generate');
        const qrcodebox = document.querySelector('.body_qr');
        function renderTicket(ticket) {
            const ticketInfo = document.getElementById("ticket-info");
            for (let key in ticket) {
                const div = document.createElement("div");
                div.className = "ticket-info-column";
                div.innerHTML = ticket[key];
                ticketInfo.appendChild(div);
                console.log(typeof ticket[key]);
            }
        }
        fetch(`/ticket/${id}`, {
            method: "GET",
        })
        .then(response => {
            return(response.text());
        })
        .then(data => {
            const ticket = JSON.parse(data)[0];
            renderTicket(ticket);
            textGen(ticket);
        })

        function cancel() {
            fetch(`/own/${id}`, {
                method: "DELETE",
                headers: {
                    "Content-Type": "text/html"
                },
                body: `ticket_id=${id}`
            })
            .then(response => {
                return(response.status);
            })
            .then(status => {
                if (status == 200) {
                    window.location.replace("http://localhost:8001/inventory");
                }
                else {
                    alert("Error");
                }
            });
        }

        }

        function print() {

        }
        //tao ma qr

        generate.addEventListener('click',(e)=>{
            e.preventDefault();
                      
        });

            var qrInfo='3';
            for (let i=1;i<10;i++) {
               
                qrInfo =qrInfo+"1";
              
            }
            return qrInfo;

Mon Jan  1 01:40:39 2024

GET /info/1 HTTP/1.1
Host: localhost:8001
User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Ubuntu; Linux x86_64; rv:120.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/120.0
Accept: text/html,application/xhtml+xml,application/xml;q=0.9,image/avif,image/webp,*/*;q=0.8
Accept-Language: en-US,en;q=0.5
Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflate, br
Referer: http://localhost:8001/inventory

Sec-Fetch-Site: same-origin
Sec-Fetch-User: ?1


Mon Jan  1 01:40:39 2024

HTTP/1.1 200 OK

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
    <body>
        <div id="ticket-info"></div>
        <div>
            <button type="button" onclick="cancel()">Cancel</button>
            <button type="button" onclick="exchange()">Exchange</button>
            <button type="button" onclick="print()">Exchange</button>
            <button type="button" id="generate" >QRcode</button>
        </div>
        <div class="body_qr"></div>
        <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/qrcodejs/1.0.0/qrcode.min.js"></script>
    </body>
    <script>
        const url = window.location.pathname;
        const id = url.split("/")[2];
        const generate= document.getElementById('generate');
        const qrcodebox = document.querySelector('.body_qr');
        function renderTicket(ticket) {
            const ticketInfo = document.getElementById("ticket-info");
            for (let key in ticket) {
                const div = document.createElement("div");
                div.className = "ticket-info-column";
                div.innerHTML = ticket[key];
                ticketInfo.appendChild(div);
                console.log(typeof ticket[key]);
            }
        }
        fetch(`/ticket/${id}`, {
            method: "GET",
        })
        .then(response => {
            return(response.text());
        })
        .then(data => {
            const ticket = JSON.parse(data)[0];
            renderTicket(ticket);
            textGen(ticket);
        })

        function cancel() {
            fetch(`/own/${id}`, {
                method: "DELETE",
                headers: {
                    "Content-Type": "text/html"
                },
                body: `ticket_id=${id}`
            })
            .then(response => {
                return(response.status);
            })
            .then(status => {
                if (status == 200) {
                    window.location.replace("http://localhost:8001/inventory");
                }
                else {
                    alert("Error");
                }
            });
        }

        function exchange() {

        }

        function print() {

        }
        //tao ma qr

        generate.addEventListener('click',(e)=>{
            e.preventDefault();
                      
        });
        var qrInfo='3';
        function textGen(ticket){
            qrInfo = qrInfo + '1';
            for (let i=1;i<10;i++) {
               
                qrInfo =qrInfo+"1";
              
            }
            return qrInfo;
        }
             
        console.log(qrInfo);
        function generateQRCode(qrInfo){
            
            qrcodebox.innerHTML="";
            new QRCode(qrcodebox,{
                text:qrInfo,
                height:100,
                width:100,
                colorLight:"#fff",
                colorDark:"#000"
            });

        }
    
    </script>
    
</html>


Mon Jan  1 01:40:39 2024

Accept-Language: en-US,en;q=0.5
Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflate, br
Referer: http://localhost:8001/inventory
Connection: keep-alive
Upgrade-Insecure-Requests: 1
Sec-Fetch-Dest: document
Sec-Fetch-Mode: navigate
Sec-Fetch-Site: same-origin
Sec-Fetch-User: ?1


Mon Jan  1 01:40:39 2024

HTTP/1.1 200 OK

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
    <body>
        <div id="ticket-info"></div>
        <div>
            <button type="button" onclick="cancel()">Cancel</button>
            <button type="button" onclick="exchange()">Exchange</button>
            <button type="button" onclick="print()">Exchange</button>
            <button type="button" id="generate" >QRcode</button>
        </div>
        <div class="body_qr"></div>
        <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/qrcodejs/1.0.0/qrcode.min.js"></script>
    </body>
    <script>
        const url = window.location.pathname;
        const id = url.split("/")[2];
        const generate= document.getElementById('generate');
        const qrcodebox = document.querySelector('.body_qr');
        function renderTicket(ticket) {
            const ticketInfo = document.getElementById("ticket-info");
            for (let key in ticket) {
                const div = document.createElement("div");
                div.className = "ticket-info-column";
                div.innerHTML = ticket[key];
                ticketInfo.appendChild(div);
                console.log(typeof ticket[key]);
            }
        }
        fetch(`/ticket/${id}`, {
            method: "GET",
        })
        .then(response => {
            return(response.text());
        })
        .then(data => {
            const ticket = JSON.parse(data)[0];
            renderTicket(ticket);
            textGen(ticket);
        })

        function cancel() {
            fetch(`/own/${id}`, {
                method: "DELETE",
                headers: {
                    "Content-Type": "text/html"
                },
                body: `ticket_id=${id}`
            })
            .then(response => {
                return(response.status);
            })
            .then(status => {
                if (status == 200) {
                    window.location.replace("http://localhost:8001/inventory");
                }
                else {
                    alert("Error");
                }
            });
        }

        function exchange() {

        }

        function print() {

        }
        //tao ma qr

        generate.addEventListener('click',(e)=>{
            e.preventDefault();
                      
        });
        var qrInfo='3';
        function textGen(ticket){
            qrInfo = qrInfo + '1';
            for (let i=1;i<10;i++) {
               
                qrInfo =qrInfo+"1";
              
            }
            return qrInfo;
        }
             
        console.log(qrInfo);
        function generateQRCode(qrInfo){
            
            qrcodebox.innerHTML="";
            new QRCode(qrcodebox,{
                text:qrInfo,
                height:100,
                width:100,
                colorLight:"#fff",
                colorDark:"#000"
            });

        }
    
    </script>
    
</html>

HTTP/1.1 200 OK

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
    <body>
        <div id="ticket-info"></div>
        <div>
            <button type="button" onclick="cancel()">Cancel</button>
            <button type="button" onclick="exchange()">Exchange</button>
            <button type="button" onclick="print()">Exchange</button>
            <button type="button" id="generate" >QRcode</button>
        </div>
        <div class="body_qr"></div>
        <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/qrcodejs/1.0.0/qrcode.min.js"></script>
    </body>
    <script>
        const url = window.location.pathname;
        const id = url.split("/")[2];
        const generate= document.getElementById('generate');
        const qrcodebox = document.querySelector('.body_qr');
        function renderTicket(ticket) {
            const ticketInfo = document.getElementById("ticket-info");
            for (let key in ticket) {
                const div = document.createElement("div");
                div.className = "ticket-info-column";
                div.innerHTML = ticket[key];
                ticketInfo.appendChild(div);
                console.log(typeof ticket[key]);
            }
        }
        fetch(`/ticket/${id}`, {
            method: "GET",
        })
        .then(response => {
            return(response.text());
        })
        .then(data => {
            const ticket = JSON.parse(data)[0];
            renderTicket(ticket);
            textGen(ticket);
        })

        function cancel() {
            fetch(`/own/${id}`, {
                method: "DELETE",
                headers: {
                    "Content-Type": "text/html"
                },
                body: `ticket_id=${id}`
            })
            .then(response => {
                return(response.status);
            })
            .then(status => {
                if (status == 200) {
                    window.location.replace("http://localhost:8001/inventory");
                }
                else {
                    alert("Error");
                }
            });
        }

        function exchange() {

        }

        function print() {

        }
        //tao ma qr

        generate.addEventListener('click',(e)=>{
            e.preventDefault();
                      
        });
        var qrInfo='3';
        function textGen(ticket){
            qrInfo = qrInfo + '1';
            for (let i=1;i<10;i++) {
               
                qrInfo =qrInfo+"1";
              
            }
            return qrInfo;
        }
             
        console.log(qrInfo);
        function generateQRCode(qrInfo){
            
            qrcodebox.innerHTML="";
            new QRCode(qrcodebox,{
                text:qrInfo,
                height:100,
                width:100,
                colorLight:"#fff",
                colorDark:"#000"
            });

        }
    
    </script>
    
</html>
