<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
    <body>
        <div id="ticket-info"></div>
        <div>
            <button type="button" onclick="cancel()">Cancel</button>
            <button type="button" onclick="exchange()">Exchange</button>
            <button type="button" onclick="print()">Exchange</button>
            <button type="button" id="generate" >QRcode</button>
        </div>
        <div class="body_qr"></div>
        <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/qrcodejs/1.0.0/qrcode.min.js"></script>
    </body>
    <script>
        const url = window.location.pathname;
        const id = url.split("/")[2];
        const generate= document.getElementById('generate');
        const qrcodebox = document.querySelector('.body_qr');
        function renderTicket(ticket) {
            const ticketInfo = document.getElementById("ticket-info");
            for (let key in ticket) {
                const div = document.createElement("div");
                div.className = "ticket-info-column";
                div.innerHTML = ticket[key];
                ticketInfo.appendChild(div);
                console.log(typeof ticket[key]);
            }
        }
        fetch(`/ticket/${id}`, {
            method: "GET",
        })
        .then(response => {
            return(response.text());
        })
        .then(data => {
            const ticket = JSON.parse(data)[0];
            renderTicket(ticket);
            textGen(ticket);
        })

        function cancel() {
            fetch(`/own/${id}`, {
                method: "DELETE",
                headers: {
                    "Content-Type": "text/html"
                },
                body: `ticket_id=${id}`
            })
            .then(response => {
                return(response.status);
            })
            .then(status => {
                if (status == 200) {
                    window.location.replace("http://localhost:8001/inventory");
                }
                else {
                    alert("Error");
                }
            });
        }

        function exchange() {

        }

        function print() {

        }
        //tao ma qr

        generate.addEventListener('click',(e)=>{
            e.preventDefault();
                      
        });
        var qrInfo='3';
        function textGen(ticket){
            qrInfo = qrInfo + '1';
            for (let i=1;i<10;i++) {
               
                qrInfo =qrInfo+"1";
              
            }
            return qrInfo;
        }

        function generateQRCode(qrInfo){
            
            qrcodebox.innerHTML="";
            new QRCode(qrcodebox,{
                text:qrInfo,
                height:100,
                width:100,
                colorLight:"#fff",
                colorDark:"#000"
            });

HTTP/1.1 200 OK

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
    <body>
        <div id="ticket-info"></div>
        <div>
            <button type="button" onclick="cancel()">Cancel</button>
            <button type="button" onclick="exchange()">Exchange</button>
            <button type="button" onclick="print()">Exchange</button>
            <button type="button" id="generate" >QRcode</button>
        </div>
        <div class="body_qr"></div>
        <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/qrcodejs/1.0.0/qrcode.min.js"></script>
    </body>
    <script>
        const url = window.location.pathname;
        const id = url.split("/")[2];
        const generate= document.getElementById('generate');
        const qrcodebox = document.querySelector('.body_qr');
        function renderTicket(ticket) {
            const ticketInfo = document.getElementById("ticket-info");
            for (let key in ticket) {
                const div = document.createElement("div");
                div.className = "ticket-info-column";
                div.innerHTML = ticket[key];
                ticketInfo.appendChild(div);
                console.log(typeof ticket[key]);
            }
        }
        fetch(`/ticket/${id}`, {
            method: "GET",
        })
        .then(response => {
            return(response.text());
        })
        .then(data => {
            const ticket = JSON.parse(data)[0];
            renderTicket(ticket);
            textGen(ticket);
        })

        function cancel() {
            fetch(`/own/${id}`, {
                method: "DELETE",
                headers: {
                    "Content-Type": "text/html"
                },
                body: `ticket_id=${id}`
            })
            .then(response => {
                return(response.status);
            })
            .then(status => {
                if (status == 200) {
                    window.location.replace("http://localhost:8001/inventory");
                }
                else {
                    alert("Error");
                }
            });
        }

        function exchange() {

        }

        function print() {

        }
        //tao ma qr

        generate.addEventListener('click',(e)=>{
            e.preventDefault();
                      
        });
        var qrInfo='3';
        function textGen(ticket){
            qrInfo = qrInfo + '1';
            for (let i=1;i<10;i++) {
               
                qrInfo =qrInfo+"1";
              
            }
            return qrInfo;
        }
             
        console.log(qrInfo);
        function generateQRCode(qrInfo){
            
            qrcodebox.innerHTML="";
            new QRCode(qrcodebox,{
                text:qrInfo,
                height:100,
                width:100,
                colorLight:"#fff",
                colorDark:"#000"
            });

        }
    
    </script>

            textGen(ticket);
        })

                method: "DELETE",
                headers: {
                    "Content-Type": "text/html"
                },
                body: `ticket_id=${id}`
            })

                return(response.status);

                    window.location.replace("http://localhost:8001/inventory");

            for (let i=1;i<10;i++) {

            return qrInfo;
        }

                text:qrInfo,
                height:100,
                width:100,
                colorLight:"#fff",

            });

Mon Jan  1 01:41:33 2024

HTTP/1.1 200 OK

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
    <body>
        <div id="ticket-info"></div>
        <div>
            <button type="button" onclick="cancel()">Cancel</button>
            <button type="button" onclick="exchange()">Exchange</button>
            <button type="button" onclick="print()">Exchange</button>
            <button type="button" id="generate" >QRcode</button>
        </div>
        <div class="body_qr"></div>
        <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/qrcodejs/1.0.0/qrcode.min.js"></script>
    </body>
    <script>
        const url = window.location.pathname;
        const id = url.split("/")[2];
        const generate= document.getElementById('generate');
        const qrcodebox = document.querySelector('.body_qr');
        function renderTicket(ticket) {
            const ticketInfo = document.getElementById("ticket-info");
            for (let key in ticket) {
                const div = document.createElement("div");
                div.className = "ticket-info-column";
                div.innerHTML = ticket[key];
                ticketInfo.appendChild(div);
                console.log(typeof ticket[key]);
            }
        }
        fetch(`/ticket/${id}`, {
            method: "GET",
        })
        .then(response => {
            return(response.text());
        })
        .then(data => {
            const ticket = JSON.parse(data)[0];
            renderTicket(ticket);
            textGen(ticket);
        })

        function cancel() {
            fetch(`/own/${id}`, {
                method: "DELETE",
                headers: {
                    "Content-Type": "text/html"
                },
                body: `ticket_id=${id}`
            })
            .then(response => {
                return(response.status);
            })
            .then(status => {
                if (status == 200) {
                    window.location.replace("http://localhost:8001/inventory");
                }
                else {
                    alert("Error");
                }
            });
        }

        function exchange() {

        }

        function print() {

        }
        //tao ma qr

        generate.addEventListener('click',(e)=>{
            e.preventDefault();
                      
        });
        var qrInfo='3';
        function textGen(ticket){
           
            for (let i=1;i<10;i++) {
               
                qrInfo =qrInfo +tiket[key];
              
            }
            return qrInfo;
        }
             
        console.log(textGen());
        function generateQRCode(qrInfo){
            
            qrcodebox.innerHTML="";
            new QRCode(qrcodebox,{
                text:qrInfo,
                height:100,
                width:100,
                colorLight:"#fff",
                colorDark:"#000"
            });

        }
    
    </script>
    
</html>

            textGen(ticket);
        })
        console.log(tiket[1]);
        function cancel() {
            fetch(`/own/${id}`, {
                method: "DELETE",
                headers: {
                    "Content-Type": "text/html"
                },
                body: `ticket_id=${id}`
            })
            .then(response => {
                return(response.status);
            })
            .then(status => {
                if (status == 200) {
                    window.location.replace("http://localhost:8001/inventory");
                }
                else {
                    alert("Error");
                }
            });
        }

        function exchange() {

        }

        function print() {

        }
        //tao ma qr

        generate.addEventListener('click',(e)=>{
            e.preventDefault();
                      
        });
        var qrInfo='';
        function textGen(ticket){
           for(let i=1;i<=10;i++){
            qrInfo=qrInfo+"1";
           }
            // for (let key in ticket) {
               
            //     qrInfo =qrInfo +tiket[key];
              
            // }
            return qrInfo;
        }
        function generateQRCode(qrInfo){
            
            qrcodebox.innerHTML="";
            new QRCode(qrcodebox,{
                text:qrInfo,
                height:100,
                width:100,
                colorLight:"#fff",
                colorDark:"#000"
            });

        }
    
    </script>
    
</html>

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
    <body>
        <div id="ticket-info"></div>
        <div>
            <button type="button" onclick="cancel()">Cancel</button>
            <button type="button" onclick="exchange()">Exchange</button>

    </body>
    <script>
        const url = window.location.pathname;
        const id = url.split("/")[2];
        const generate= document.getElementById('generate');
        const qrcodebox = document.querySelector('.body_qr');
        function renderTicket(ticket) {
            const ticketInfo = document.getElementById("ticket-info");
            for (let key in ticket) {
                const div = document.createElement("div");
                div.className = "ticket-info-column";
                div.innerHTML = ticket[key];
                ticketInfo.appendChild(div);
                console.log(typeof ticket[key]);
            }
        }
        const ticket=null;
        fetch(`/ticket/${id}`, {
            method: "GET",
        })
        .then(response => {
            return(response.text());
        })
        .then(data => {
            const ticket = JSON.parse(data)[0];
            renderTicket(ticket);
            textGen(ticket);
        })
        console.log(tiket[1]);
        function cancel() {
            fetch(`/own/${id}`, {
                method: "DELETE",
                headers: {
                    "Content-Type": "text/html"
                },
                body: `ticket_id=${id}`
            })
            .then(response => {
                return(response.status);
            })
            .then(status => {
                if (status == 200) {
                    window.location.replace("http://localhost:8001/inventory");
                }
                else {
                    alert("Error");
                }
            });
        }

        }

        }

                height:100,

                colorLight:"#fff",
                colorDark:"#000"
            });

Mon Jan  1 01:58:49 2024

HTTP/1.1 200 OK

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="../static/index.css">
    <body>
        <h1>hello <span id="username"></span></h1>

        <a href="http://localhost:8001/login" class="auth">login</a>
        <a href="http://localhost:8001/register" class="auth">register</a>
        <a href="http://localhost:8001/inventory" class="nav">inventory</a>
        <a href="http://localhost:8001" onclick="logout()" class="nav">logout</a>

        <div id="tickets-info">
            <div id="tickets-search">
                <input type="text" name="from" id="from" placeholder="From">
                <input type="text" name="to" id="to" placeholder="To">
                <input type="airline" name="airline" id="airline" placeholder="Airline">
                <input type="datetime-local" name="datetime" id="datetime">
                <button type="button" onclick="filter()">Filter</button>
            </div>
            <div id="tickets-column">
                <span>Flight</span>
                <span>From</span>
                <span>To</span>
                <span>Date</span>
                <span>Time</span>
                <span>Airline</span>
                <span>Ticket</span>
                <span>Seat</span>
                <span>Price</span>
            </div>
            <ul id="tickets"></ul>
        </div>

    </body>

    <script>
        let tickets = [];
        let filteredTickets = [];

        // hien thi elements tuy thuoc vao trang thai dang nhap
        let username = localStorage.getItem("username");
        let authElements = document.querySelectorAll(".auth");
        let navElements = document.querySelectorAll(".nav");
        if (username != null) {
            document.getElementById("username").innerHTML = username;
            authElements.forEach(item => item.style.display = "none");
            navElements.forEach(item => item.style.display = "block");
        }
        else {
            authElements.forEach(item => item.style.display = "block");
            navElements.forEach(item => item.style.display = "none");
        }

        // xoa data nguoi dung duoc luu trong ls
        function logout() {
            localStorage.clear();
        }

        function filter() {
            let from = document.getElementById("from").value;
            let to = document.getElementById("to").value;
            let airline = document.getElementById("airline").value;
            let datetime= document.getElementById("datetime").value;
            filteredTickets = tickets;
            console.log(`from: ${from}, to: ${to}, datetime: ${datetime}`);
            if (from != "") {
                filteredTickets = filteredTickets.filter(flight => 
                    flight.from.includes(from));
            }
            if (to != "") {
                filteredTickets = filteredTickets.filter(flight => 
                    flight.to.includes(to));
            }
            if (airline != "") {
                filteredTickets = filteredTickets.filter(flight => 
                    flight.airline.includes(airline));
            }
            if (datetime != "") {
                filteredTickets = filteredTickets.filter(flight => 
                    Date.parse(datetime)== Date.parse(`${flight.date}T${flight.time}:00`));
            }
            renderTickets();
        }

        function renderTickets() {
            const ul = document.getElementById("tickets");
            ul.innerHTML = ""; // xoa cac element da co de them tu dau
            filteredTickets.forEach(ticket => {
                const li = document.createElement("li");
                li.className = "ticket";
                for (const key in ticket) {
                    const span = document.createElement("span");
                    span.textContent = ticket[key];
                    li.appendChild(span);
                }
                const a = document.createElement("a");
                a.setAttribute("href", `http://localhost:8001/buy/${ticket.ticket_id}`);
                a.innerHTML = "Buy";
                li.appendChild(a);
                ul.appendChild(li);
            });
        }

        fetch("/tickets", {
            method: "GET",
        })
        .then(response => {
            return(response.text());
        })
        .then(data => {
            tickets = JSON.parse(data);
            filteredTickets = tickets;
            renderTickets();
        })
    </script>
</html>

Mon Jan  1 01:58:52 2024

HTTP/1.1 200 OK

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="../static/inventory.css">
    <body>
        <h1><span id="username"></span>'s tickets</h1>

        <a href="http://localhost:8001">home</a>

        <div id="tickets-info">
            <div id="tickets-search">
                <input type="text" name="from" id="from" placeholder="From">
                <input type="text" name="to" id="to" placeholder="To">
                <input type="airline" name="airline" id="airline" placeholder="Airline">
                <input type="datetime-local" name="datetime" id="datetime">
                <button type="button" onclick="filter()">Filter</button>
            </div>
            <div id="tickets-column">
                <span>Flight</span>
                <span>From</span>
                <span>To</span>
                <span>Date</span>
                <span>Time</span>
                <span>Airline</span>
                <span>Ticket</span>
                <span>Seat</span>
                <span>Price</span>
            </div>
            <ul id="tickets"></ul>
        </div>
    </body>
    <script>
        const username = localStorage.getItem("username");
        if (username == null) {
            window.location = "http://localhost:8001/login"
        }
        document.getElementById("username").innerHTML = username;
        
        let tickets = [];
        let filteredTickets = [];

        function filter() {
            let from = document.getElementById("from").value;
            let to = document.getElementById("to").value;
            let airline = document.getElementById("airline").value;
            let datetime= document.getElementById("datetime").value;
            filteredTickets = tickets;
            console.log(`from: ${from}, to: ${to}, datetime: ${datetime}`);
            if (from != "") {
                filteredTickets = filteredTickets.filter(flight => 
                    flight.from.includes(from));
            }
            if (to != "") {
                filteredTickets = filteredTickets.filter(flight => 
                    flight.to.includes(to));
            }
            if (airline != "") {
                filteredTickets = filteredTickets.filter(flight => 
                    flight.airline.includes(airline));
            }
            if (datetime != "") {
                filteredTickets = filteredTickets.filter(flight => 
                    Date.parse(datetime)== Date.parse(`${flight.date}T${flight.time}:00`));
            }
            renderTickets();
        }

        function renderTickets() {
            const ul = document.getElementById("tickets");
            ul.innerHTML = ""; // xoa cac element da co de them tu dau
            filteredTickets.forEach(ticket => {
                const li = document.createElement("li");
                li.className = "ticket";
                for (const key in ticket) {
                    const span = document.createElement("span");
                    span.textContent = ticket[key];
                    li.appendChild(span);
                }
                const a = document.createElement("a");
                a.setAttribute("href", `http://localhost:8001/info/${ticket.ticket_id}`);
                a.innerHTML = "Info";
                li.appendChild(a);
                ul.appendChild(li);
            });
        }

        fetch(`/inventory/${username}`, {
            method: "GET",
        })
        .then(response => {
            return(response.text());
        })
        .then(data => {
            tickets = JSON.parse(data);
            filteredTickets = tickets;
            renderTickets();
        })
    </script>
</html>

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
    <body>
        <div id="ticket-info"></div>
        <div>
            <button type="button" onclick="cancel()">Cancel</button>
            <button type="button" onclick="exchange()">Exchange</button>
            <button type="button" onclick="print()">Exchange</button>
            <button type="button" id="generate" >QRcode</button>
        </div>
        <div class="body_qr"></div>
        <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/qrcodejs/1.0.0/qrcode.min.js"></script>
    </body>
    <script>
        const url = window.location.pathname;
        const id = url.split("/")[2];
        const generate= document.getElementById('generate');
        const qrcodebox = document.querySelector('.body_qr');
        function renderTicket(ticket) {
            const ticketInfo = document.getElementById("ticket-info");
            for (let key in ticket) {
                const div = document.createElement("div");
                div.className = "ticket-info-column";
                div.innerHTML = ticket[key];
                ticketInfo.appendChild(div);
                console.log(typeof ticket[key]);
            }
        }
        const ticket=null;
        fetch(`/ticket/${id}`, {
            method: "GET",
        })
        .then(response => {
            return(response.text());
        })
        .then(data => {
            const ticket = JSON.parse(data)[0];
            renderTicket(ticket);
            textGen(ticket);
        })
        console.log(tiket[1]);
        function cancel() {
            fetch(`/own/${id}`, {
                method: "DELETE",
                headers: {
                    "Content-Type": "text/html"
                },
                body: `ticket_id=${id}`
            })
            .then(response => {
                return(response.status);
            })
            .then(status => {
                if (status == 200) {
                    window.location.replace("http://localhost:8001/inventory");
                }
                else {
                    alert("Error");
                }
            });
        }

        function exchange() {

        }

        function print() {

        }
        //tao ma qr

        generate.addEventListener('click',(e)=>{
            e.preventDefault();
                      
        });
        var qrInfo='';
        function textGen(ticket){
           for(let i=1;i<=10;i++){
            qrInfo=qrInfo+"1";
           }
            // for (let key in ticket) {
               
            //     qrInfo =qrInfo +tiket[key];
              
            // }
            return qrInfo;
        }
        function generateQRCode(qrInfo){
            
            qrcodebox.innerHTML="";
            new QRCode(qrcodebox,{
                text:qrInfo,
                height:100,
                width:100,
                colorLight:"#fff",
                colorDark:"#000"
            });

        }
    
    </script>
    
</html>

Mon Jan  1 02:04:32 2024

HTTP/1.1 200 OK

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
    <body>
        <div id="ticket-info"></div>
        <div>
            <button type="button" onclick="cancel()">Cancel</button>
            <button type="button" onclick="exchange()">Exchange</button>
            <button type="button" onclick="print()">Exchange</button>
            <button type="button" id="generate" >QRcode</button>
        </div>
        <div class="body_qr"></div>
        <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/qrcodejs/1.0.0/qrcode.min.js"></script>
    </body>
    <script>
        const url = window.location.pathname;
        const id = url.split("/")[2];
        const generate= document.getElementById('generate');
        const qrcodebox = document.querySelector('.body_qr');
        function renderTicket(ticket) {
            const ticketInfo = document.getElementById("ticket-info");
            for (let key in ticket) {
                const div = document.createElement("div");
                div.className = "ticket-info-column";
                div.innerHTML = ticket[key];
                ticketInfo.appendChild(div);
                console.log(typeof ticket[key]);
            }
        }
        
        fetch(`/ticket/${id}`, {
            method: "GET",
        })
        .then(response => {
            return(response.text());
        })
        .then(data => {
            const ticket = JSON.parse(data)[0];
            renderTicket(ticket);
            textGen(ticket);
        })
        
        function cancel() {
            fetch(`/own/${id}`, {
                method: "DELETE",
                headers: {
                    "Content-Type": "text/html"
                },
                body: `ticket_id=${id}`
            })
            .then(response => {
                return(response.status);
            })
            .then(status => {
                if (status == 200) {
                    window.location.replace("http://localhost:8001/inventory");
                }
                else {
                    alert("Error");
                }
            });
        }

        function exchange() {

        }

        function print() {

        }
        //tao ma qr

        generate.addEventListener('click',(e)=>{
            e.preventDefault();
                      
        });
        var qrInfo='';
        function textGen(ticket){
        //    for(let i=1;i<=10;i++){
        //     qrInfo=qrInfo+"1";
        //    }
            for (let key in ticket) {
               
                qrInfo =qrInfo +ticket[key];
              
            }
            return qrInfo;
        }
        function generateQRCode(qrInfo){
            
            qrcodebox.innerHTML="";
            new QRCode(qrcodebox,{
                text:qrInfo,
                height:100,
                width:100,
                colorLight:"#fff",
                colorDark:"#000"
            });

        }
    
    </script>

        </div>
        <div class="body_qr"></div>
        <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/qrcodejs/1.0.0/qrcode.min.js"></script>
    </body>
    <script>
        const url = window.location.pathname;
        const id = url.split("/")[2];
        const generate= document.getElementById('generate');
        const qrcodebox = document.querySelector('.body_qr');
        function renderTicket(ticket) {
            const ticketInfo = document.getElementById("ticket-info");
            for (let key in ticket) {
                const div = document.createElement("div");
                div.className = "ticket-info-column";
                div.innerHTML = ticket[key];
                ticketInfo.appendChild(div);
                console.log(typeof ticket[key]);
            }
        }
        
        fetch(`/ticket/${id}`, {
            method: "GET",
        })
        .then(response => {
            return(response.text());
        })
        .then(data => {
            const ticket = JSON.parse(data)[0];
            renderTicket(ticket);
            textGen(ticket);
        })
        
        function cancel() {
            fetch(`/own/${id}`, {
                method: "DELETE",
                headers: {
                    "Content-Type": "text/html"
                },
                body: `ticket_id=${id}`
            })
            .then(response => {
                return(response.status);
            })
            .then(status => {
                if (status == 200) {
                    window.location.replace("http://localhost:8001/inventory");
                }
                else {
                    alert("Error");
                }
            });
        }

        function exchange() {

        }

        function print() {

        }
        //tao ma qr

        generate.addEventListener('click',(e)=>{
            e.preventDefault();
                      
        });
        var qrInfo='';
        function textGen(ticket){
        //    for(let i=1;i<=10;i++){
        //     qrInfo=qrInfo+"1";
        //    }
            for (i=1;i<=2;i++) {
               
                qrInfo =qrInfo +ticket[1];
              
            }
            return qrInfo;
        }
        console.log(qrInfo);
        function generateQRCode(qrInfo){
            
            qrcodebox.innerHTML="";
            new QRCode(qrcodebox,{
                text:qrInfo,
                height:100,
                width:100,
                colorLight:"#fff",
                colorDark:"#000"
            });

        }
    
    </script>
    
</html>

            const ticketInfo = document.getElementById("ticket-info");

                const div = document.createElement("div");

                div.innerHTML = ticket[key];

        //    for(let i=1;i<=10;i++){
        //     qrInfo=qrInfo+"1";
        //    }
            for (i=1;i<=2;i++) {
               
                qrInfo =qrInfo +"1";

            return qrInfo;

            <button type="button" onclick="cancel()">Cancel</button>
            <button type="button" onclick="exchange()">Exchange</button>
            <button type="button" onclick="print()">Exchange</button>
            <button type="button" id="generate" >QRcode</button>
        </div>

    <script>
        const url = window.location.pathname;
        const id = url.split("/")[2];
        const generate= document.getElementById('generate');
        const qrcodebox = document.querySelector('.body_qr');
        function renderTicket(ticket) {
            const ticketInfo = document.getElementById("ticket-info");
            for (let key in ticket) {
                const div = document.createElement("div");
                div.className = "ticket-info-column";
                div.innerHTML = ticket[key];
                ticketInfo.appendChild(div);
                console.log(typeof ticket[key]);
            }
        }
        
        fetch(`/ticket/${id}`, {
            method: "GET",
        })
        .then(response => {
            return(response.text());
        })
        .then(data => {
            const ticket = JSON.parse(data)[0];
            renderTicket(ticket);
            textGen(ticket);
        })
        
        function cancel() {
            fetch(`/own/${id}`, {
                method: "DELETE",
                headers: {
                    "Content-Type": "text/html"
                },
                body: `ticket_id=${id}`
            })
            .then(response => {
                return(response.status);
            })
            .then(status => {
                if (status == 200) {
                    window.location.replace("http://localhost:8001/inventory");
                }
                else {
                    alert("Error");
                }
            });

        function exchange() {

        }

        function print() {

        }
        //tao ma qr

        generate.addEventListener('click',(e)=>{
            e.preventDefault();
                      
        });
        var qrInfo='';
        function textGen(ticket){
        //    for(let i=1;i<=10;i++){
        //     qrInfo=qrInfo+"1";
        //    }
            for (let key in ticket) {
               
                qrInfo =qrInfo +ticket[key]+'/n';
              
            }
            console.log(qrInfo);
            return qrInfo;
        }
        
        function generateQRCode(qrInfo){
            
            qrcodebox.innerHTML="";
            new QRCode(qrcodebox,{
                text:qrInfo,
                height:100,
                width:100,
                colorLight:"#fff",
                colorDark:"#000"
            });

        <div>
            <button type="button" onclick="cancel()">Cancel</button>
            <button type="button" onclick="exchange()">Exchange</button>
            <button type="button" onclick="print()">Exchange</button>
            <button type="button" id="generate" >QRcode</button>
        </div>
        <div class="body_qr"></div>
        <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/qrcodejs/1.0.0/qrcode.min.js"></script>
    </body>
    <script>
        const url = window.location.pathname;
        const id = url.split("/")[2];
        const generate= document.getElementById('generate');
        const qrcodebox = document.querySelector('.body_qr');
        function renderTicket(ticket) {
            const ticketInfo = document.getElementById("ticket-info");
            for (let key in ticket) {
                const div = document.createElement("div");
                div.className = "ticket-info-column";
                div.innerHTML = ticket[key];
                ticketInfo.appendChild(div);
                console.log(typeof ticket[key]);
            }
        }
        
        fetch(`/ticket/${id}`, {
            method: "GET",
        })
        .then(response => {
            return(response.text());
        })
        .then(data => {
            const ticket = JSON.parse(data)[0];
            renderTicket(ticket);
            textGen(ticket);
        })
        
        function cancel() {
            fetch(`/own/${id}`, {
                method: "DELETE",
                headers: {
                    "Content-Type": "text/html"
                },
                body: `ticket_id=${id}`
            })
            .then(response => {
                return(response.status);
            })
            .then(status => {
                if (status == 200) {
                    window.location.replace("http://localhost:8001/inventory");
                }
                else {
                    alert("Error");
                }
            });
        }

        function exchange() {

        }

        function print() {

        }
        //tao ma qr

        generate.addEventListener('click',(e)=>{
            e.preventDefault();
                      
        });
        var qrInfo='';
        function textGen(ticket){
        //    for(let i=1;i<=10;i++){
        //     qrInfo=qrInfo+"1";
        //    }
            for (let key in ticket) {
               
                qrInfo =qrInfo +ticket[key];
              
            }
            generateQRCode(qrInfo);
        }
        
        function generateQRCode(qrInfo){
            
            qrcodebox.innerHTML="";
            new QRCode(qrcodebox,{
                text:qrInfo,
                height:100,
                width:100,
                colorLight:"#fff",
                colorDark:"#000"
            });

        }
    
    </script>
    
</html>

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
    <body>
        <div id="ticket-info"></div>
        <div>
            <button type="button" onclick="cancel()">Cancel</button>
            <button type="button" onclick="exchange()">Exchange</button>
            <button type="button" onclick="print()">Exchange</button>
            <button type="button" id="generate" >QRcode</button>
        </div>
        <div class="body_qr"></div>
        <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/qrcodejs/1.0.0/qrcode.min.js"></script>
    </body>
    <script>
        const url = window.location.pathname;
        const id = url.split("/")[2];
        const generate= document.getElementById('generate');
        const qrcodebox = document.querySelector('.body_qr');
        function renderTicket(ticket) {
            const ticketInfo = document.getElementById("ticket-info");
            for (let key in ticket) {
                const div = document.createElement("div");
                div.className = "ticket-info-column";
                div.innerHTML = ticket[key];
                ticketInfo.appendChild(div);
                console.log(typeof ticket[key]);
            }
        }
        
        fetch(`/ticket/${id}`, {
            method: "GET",
        })
        .then(response => {
            return(response.text());
        })
        .then(data => {
            const ticket = JSON.parse(data)[0];
            renderTicket(ticket);
            textGen(ticket);
        })
        
        function cancel() {
            fetch(`/own/${id}`, {
                method: "DELETE",
                headers: {
                    "Content-Type": "text/html"
                },
                body: `ticket_id=${id}`
            })
            .then(response => {
                return(response.status);
            })
            .then(status => {
                if (status == 200) {
                    window.location.replace("http://localhost:8001/inventory");
                }
                else {
                    alert("Error");
                }
            });
        }

        function exchange() {

        }

        function print() {

        }
        //tao ma qr

        
        var qrInfo='';
        function textGen(ticket){
        
            for (let key in ticket) {
               
                qrInfo =qrInfo +ticket[key];
              
            }
            generate.addEventListener('click',(e)=>{
            e.preventDefault();
            generateQRCode(qrInfo);          
        });
        }
        
        function generateQRCode(qrInfo){
            
            qrcodebox.innerHTML="";
            new QRCode(qrcodebox,{
                text:qrInfo,
                height:100,
                width:100,
                colorLight:"#fff",
                colorDark:"#000"
            });

        }
    
    </script>

Mon Jan  1 09:49:09 2024

HTTP/1.1 200 OK

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="../static/index.css">
    <body>
        <h1>hello <span id="username"></span></h1>

        <a href="http://localhost:8001/login" class="auth">login</a>
        <a href="http://localhost:8001/register" class="auth">register</a>
        <a href="http://localhost:8001/inventory" class="nav">inventory</a>
        <a href="http://localhost:8001" onclick="logout()" class="nav">logout</a>

        <div id="tickets-info">
            <div id="tickets-search">
                <input type="text" name="from" id="from" placeholder="From">
                <input type="text" name="to" id="to" placeholder="To">
                <input type="airline" name="airline" id="airline" placeholder="Airline">
                <input type="datetime-local" name="datetime" id="datetime">
                <button type="button" onclick="filter()">Filter</button>
            </div>
            <div id="tickets-column">
                <span>Flight</span>
                <span>From</span>
                <span>To</span>
                <span>Date</span>
                <span>Time</span>
                <span>Airline</span>
                <span>Ticket</span>
                <span>Seat</span>
                <span>Price</span>
            </div>
            <ul id="tickets"></ul>
        </div>

    </body>

    <script>
        let tickets = [];
        let filteredTickets = [];

        // hien thi elements tuy thuoc vao trang thai dang nhap
        let username = localStorage.getItem("username");
        let authElements = document.querySelectorAll(".auth");
        let navElements = document.querySelectorAll(".nav");
        if (username != null) {
            document.getElementById("username").innerHTML = username;
            authElements.forEach(item => item.style.display = "none");
            navElements.forEach(item => item.style.display = "block");
        }
        else {
            authElements.forEach(item => item.style.display = "block");
            navElements.forEach(item => item.style.display = "none");
        }

        // xoa data nguoi dung duoc luu trong ls
        function logout() {
            localStorage.clear();
        }

        function filter() {
            let from = document.getElementById("from").value;
            let to = document.getElementById("to").value;
            let airline = document.getElementById("airline").value;
            let datetime= document.getElementById("datetime").value;
            filteredTickets = tickets;
            console.log(`from: ${from}, to: ${to}, datetime: ${datetime}`);
            if (from != "") {
                filteredTickets = filteredTickets.filter(flight => 
                    flight.from.includes(from));
            }
            if (to != "") {
                filteredTickets = filteredTickets.filter(flight => 
                    flight.to.includes(to));
            }
            if (airline != "") {
                filteredTickets = filteredTickets.filter(flight => 
                    flight.airline.includes(airline));
            }
            if (datetime != "") {
                filteredTickets = filteredTickets.filter(flight => 
                    Date.parse(datetime)== Date.parse(`${flight.date}T${flight.time}:00`));
            }
            renderTickets();
        }

        function renderTickets() {
            const ul = document.getElementById("tickets");
            ul.innerHTML = ""; // xoa cac element da co de them tu dau
            filteredTickets.forEach(ticket => {
                const li = document.createElement("li");
                li.className = "ticket";
                for (const key in ticket) {
                    const span = document.createElement("span");
                    span.textContent = ticket[key];
                    li.appendChild(span);
                }
                const a = document.createElement("a");
                a.setAttribute("href", `http://localhost:8001/buy/${ticket.ticket_id}`);
                a.innerHTML = "Buy";
                li.appendChild(a);
                ul.appendChild(li);
            });
        }

        fetch("/tickets", {
            method: "GET",
        })
        .then(response => {
            return(response.text());
        })
        .then(data => {
            tickets = JSON.parse(data);
            filteredTickets = tickets;
            renderTickets();
        })
    </script>
</html>

Mon Jan  1 09:49:13 2024

HTTP/1.1 200 OK

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="../static/inventory.css">
    <body>
        <h1><span id="username"></span>'s tickets</h1>

        <a href="http://localhost:8001">home</a>

        <div id="tickets-info">
            <div id="tickets-search">
                <input type="text" name="from" id="from" placeholder="From">
                <input type="text" name="to" id="to" placeholder="To">
                <input type="airline" name="airline" id="airline" placeholder="Airline">
                <input type="datetime-local" name="datetime" id="datetime">
                <button type="button" onclick="filter()">Filter</button>
            </div>
            <div id="tickets-column">
                <span>Flight</span>
                <span>From</span>
                <span>To</span>
                <span>Date</span>
                <span>Time</span>
                <span>Airline</span>
                <span>Ticket</span>
                <span>Seat</span>
                <span>Price</span>
            </div>
            <ul id="tickets"></ul>
        </div>
    </body>
    <script>
        const username = localStorage.getItem("username");
        if (username == null) {
            window.location = "http://localhost:8001/login"
        }
        document.getElementById("username").innerHTML = username;
        
        let tickets = [];
        let filteredTickets = [];

        function filter() {
            let from = document.getElementById("from").value;
            let to = document.getElementById("to").value;
            let airline = document.getElementById("airline").value;
            let datetime= document.getElementById("datetime").value;
            filteredTickets = tickets;
            console.log(`from: ${from}, to: ${to}, datetime: ${datetime}`);
            if (from != "") {
                filteredTickets = filteredTickets.filter(flight => 
                    flight.from.includes(from));
            }
            if (to != "") {
                filteredTickets = filteredTickets.filter(flight => 
                    flight.to.includes(to));
            }
            if (airline != "") {
                filteredTickets = filteredTickets.filter(flight => 
                    flight.airline.includes(airline));
            }
            if (datetime != "") {
                filteredTickets = filteredTickets.filter(flight => 
                    Date.parse(datetime)== Date.parse(`${flight.date}T${flight.time}:00`));
            }
            renderTickets();
        }

        function renderTickets() {
            const ul = document.getElementById("tickets");
            ul.innerHTML = ""; // xoa cac element da co de them tu dau
            filteredTickets.forEach(ticket => {
                const li = document.createElement("li");
                li.className = "ticket";
                for (const key in ticket) {
                    const span = document.createElement("span");
                    span.textContent = ticket[key];
                    li.appendChild(span);
                }
                const a = document.createElement("a");
                a.setAttribute("href", `http://localhost:8001/info/${ticket.ticket_id}`);
                a.innerHTML = "Info";
                li.appendChild(a);
                ul.appendChild(li);
            });
        }

        fetch(`/inventory/${username}`, {
            method: "GET",
        })
        .then(response => {
            return(response.text());
        })
        .then(data => {
            tickets = JSON.parse(data);
            filteredTickets = tickets;
            renderTickets();
        })
    </script>
</html>

GET /info/1 HTTP/1.1
Host: localhost:8001
User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Ubuntu; Linux x86_64; rv:120.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/120.0
Accept: text/html,application/xhtml+xml,application/xml;q=0.9,image/avif,image/webp,*/*;q=0.8
Accept-Language: en-US,en;q=0.5
Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflate, br
Connection: keep-alive
Referer: http://localhost:8001/inventory

Mon Jan  1 09:49:15 2024

HTTP/1.1 200 OK

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
    <body>
        <div id="ticket-info"></div>
        <div>
            <button type="button" onclick="cancel()">Cancel</button>
            <button type="button" onclick="exchange()">Exchange</button>
            <button type="button" onclick="print()">Exchange</button>
            <button type="button" id="generate" >QRcode</button>
        </div>
        <div class="body_qr"></div>
        <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/qrcodejs/1.0.0/qrcode.min.js"></script>
    </body>
    <script>
        const url = window.location.pathname;
        const id = url.split("/")[2];
        const generate= document.getElementById('generate');
        const qrcodebox = document.querySelector('.body_qr');
        function renderTicket(ticket) {
            const ticketInfo = document.getElementById("ticket-info");
            for (let key in ticket) {
                const div = document.createElement("div");
                div.className = "ticket-info-column";
                div.innerHTML = ticket[key];
                ticketInfo.appendChild(div);
                console.log(typeof ticket[key]);
            }
        }
        
        fetch(`/ticket/${id}`, {
            method: "GET",
        })
        .then(response => {
            return(response.text());
        })
        .then(data => {
            const ticket = JSON.parse(data)[0];
            renderTicket(ticket);
            textGen(ticket);
        })
        
        function cancel() {
            fetch(`/own/${id}`, {
                method: "DELETE",
                headers: {
                    "Content-Type": "text/html"
                },
                body: `ticket_id=${id}`
            })
            .then(response => {
                return(response.status);
            })
            .then(status => {
                if (status == 200) {
                    window.location.replace("http://localhost:8001/inventory");
                }
                else {
                    alert("Error");
                }
            });
        }

        function exchange() {

        }

        function print() {

        }
        //tao ma qr

        
        var qrInfo='';
        function textGen(ticket){
        
            for (let key in ticket) {
               
                qrInfo =qrInfo +ticket[key];
              
            }
            generate.addEventListener('click',(e)=>{
            e.preventDefault();
            generateQRCode(qrInfo);          
        });
        }
        
        function generateQRCode(qrInfo){
            
            qrcodebox.innerHTML="";
            new QRCode(qrcodebox,{
                text:qrInfo,
                height:100,
                width:100,
                colorLight:"#fff",
                colorDark:"#000"
            });

        }
    
    </script>
    
</html>


Mon Jan  1 09:49:15 2024

Host: localhost:8001
User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Ubuntu; Linux x86_64; rv:120.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/120.0

Referer: http://localhost:8001/info/1

Sec-Fetch-Site: same-origin

User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Ubuntu; Linux x86_64; rv:120.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/120.0
Accept: text/html,application/xhtml+xml,application/xml;q=0.9,image/avif,image/webp,*/*;q=0.8
Accept-Language: en-US,en;q=0.5
Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflate, br
Referer: http://localhost:8001/inventory

Sec-Fetch-User: ?1


Mon Jan  1 09:57:36 2024

HTTP/1.1 200 OK

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
    <body>
        <div id="ticket-info"></div>
        <div>
            <button type="button" onclick="cancel()">Cancel</button>
            <button type="button" onclick="exchange()">Exchange</button>
            <button type="button" onclick="print()">Exchange</button>
            <button type="button" id="generate" >QRcode</button>
        </div>
        <a href="" id="download" download="QR_Code.png">Download</a>
        <div class="body_qr"></div>
        <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/qrcodejs/1.0.0/qrcode.min.js"></script>
    </body>
    <script>
        const url = window.location.pathname;
        const id = url.split("/")[2];
        const generate= document.getElementById('generate');
        const qrcodebox = document.querySelector('.body_qr');
        function renderTicket(ticket) {
            const ticketInfo = document.getElementById("ticket-info");
            for (let key in ticket) {
                const div = document.createElement("div");
                div.className = "ticket-info-column";
                div.innerHTML = ticket[key];
                ticketInfo.appendChild(div);
                console.log(typeof ticket[key]);
            }
        }
        
        fetch(`/ticket/${id}`, {
            method: "GET",
        })
        .then(response => {
            return(response.text());
        })
        .then(data => {
            const ticket = JSON.parse(data)[0];
            renderTicket(ticket);
            textGen(ticket);
        })
        
        function cancel() {
            fetch(`/own/${id}`, {
                method: "DELETE",
                headers: {
                    "Content-Type": "text/html"
                },
                body: `ticket_id=${id}`
            })
            .then(response => {
                return(response.status);
            })
            .then(status => {
                if (status == 200) {
                    window.location.replace("http://localhost:8001/inventory");
                }
                else {
                    alert("Error");
                }
            });
        }

        function exchange() {

        }

        function print() {

        }
        //tao ma qr
        //lay info cho qr
        var qrInfo='';
        function textGen(ticket){
        
            for (let key in ticket) {
               
                qrInfo =qrInfo +ticket[key];
              
            }
            //bat su kien click tren nut tao qrcode
            generate.addEventListener('click',(e)=>{
            e.preventDefault();
            isEmpty(qrInfo);          
        });
        }
        //kiem tra info rong hay ko
        function isEmpty(qrInfo){
            qrInfo.length>0?generateQRCode(qrInfo):alert('no information');
        }
        //gennerate qr
        function generateQRCode(qrInfo){
            
            qrcodebox.innerHTML="";
            new QRCode(qrcodebox,{
                text:qrInfo,
                height:100,
                width:100,
                colorLight:"#fff",
                colorDark:"#000"
            });

        }
        //dowload qr
        download.addEventListener('click',()=>{
            let img=document.querySelector('.body-qr img');
            if(img !== null){
            let imgAtrr=img.getAttribute('src');
            download.setAttribute("href",imgAtrr);
             }
        });
    
    </script>
    
</html>


Mon Jan  1 09:57:36 2024

Mon Jan  1 09:57:40 2024

HTTP/1.1 200 OK

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
    <body>
        <div id="ticket-info"></div>
        <div>
            <button type="button" onclick="cancel()">Cancel</button>
            <button type="button" onclick="exchange()">Exchange</button>
            <button type="button" onclick="print()">Exchange</button>
            <button type="button" id="generate" >QRcode</button>
        </div>
        <a href="" id="download" download="QR_Code.png">Download</a>
        <div class="body_qr"></div>
        <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/qrcodejs/1.0.0/qrcode.min.js"></script>
    </body>
    <script>
        const url = window.location.pathname;
        const id = url.split("/")[2];
        const generate= document.getElementById('generate');
        const qrcodebox = document.querySelector('.body_qr');
        function renderTicket(ticket) {
            const ticketInfo = document.getElementById("ticket-info");
            for (let key in ticket) {
                const div = document.createElement("div");
                div.className = "ticket-info-column";
                div.innerHTML = ticket[key];
                ticketInfo.appendChild(div);
                console.log(typeof ticket[key]);
            }
        }
        
        fetch(`/ticket/${id}`, {
            method: "GET",
        })
        .then(response => {
            return(response.text());
        })
        .then(data => {
            const ticket = JSON.parse(data)[0];
            renderTicket(ticket);
            textGen(ticket);
        })
        
        function cancel() {
            fetch(`/own/${id}`, {
                method: "DELETE",
                headers: {
                    "Content-Type": "text/html"
                },
                body: `ticket_id=${id}`
            })
            .then(response => {
                return(response.status);
            })
            .then(status => {
                if (status == 200) {
                    window.location.replace("http://localhost:8001/inventory");
                }
                else {
                    alert("Error");
                }
            });
        }

        function exchange() {

        }

        function print() {

        }
        //tao ma qr
        //lay info cho qr
        var qrInfo='';
        function textGen(ticket){
        
            for (let key in ticket) {
               
                qrInfo =qrInfo +ticket[key];
              
            }
            //bat su kien click tren nut tao qrcode
            generate.addEventListener('click',(e)=>{
            e.preventDefault();
            isEmpty(qrInfo);          
        });
        }
        //kiem tra info rong hay ko
        function isEmpty(qrInfo){
            qrInfo.length>0?generateQRCode(qrInfo):alert('no information');
        }
        //gennerate qr
        function generateQRCode(qrInfo){
            
            qrcodebox.innerHTML="";
            new QRCode(qrcodebox,{
                text:qrInfo,
                height:100,
                width:100,
                colorLight:"#fff",
                colorDark:"#000"
            });

        }
        //dowload qr
        download.addEventListener('click',()=>{
            let img=document.querySelector('.body-qr img');
            if(img !== null){
            let imgAtrr=img.getAttribute('src');
            download.setAttribute("href",imgAtrr);
             }
        });
    
    </script>
    
</html>

HTTP/1.1 200 OK

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
    <body>
        <div id="ticket-info"></div>
        <div>
            <button type="button" onclick="cancel()">Cancel</button>
            <button type="button" onclick="exchange()">Exchange</button>
            <button type="button" onclick="print()">Exchange</button>
            <button type="button" id="generate" >QRcode</button>
        </div>
        <a href="" id="download" download="QR_Code.png">Download</a>
        <div class="body_qr"></div>
        <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/qrcodejs/1.0.0/qrcode.min.js"></script>
    </body>
    <script>
        const url = window.location.pathname;
        const id = url.split("/")[2];
        const generate= document.getElementById('generate');
        const qrcodebox = document.querySelector('.body_qr');
        function renderTicket(ticket) {
            const ticketInfo = document.getElementById("ticket-info");
            for (let key in ticket) {
                const div = document.createElement("div");
                div.className = "ticket-info-column";
                div.innerHTML = ticket[key];
                ticketInfo.appendChild(div);
                console.log(typeof ticket[key]);
            }
        }
        
        fetch(`/ticket/${id}`, {
            method: "GET",
        })
        .then(response => {
            return(response.text());
        })
        .then(data => {
            const ticket = JSON.parse(data)[0];
            renderTicket(ticket);
            textGen(ticket);
        })
        
        function cancel() {
            fetch(`/own/${id}`, {
                method: "DELETE",
                headers: {
                    "Content-Type": "text/html"
                },
                body: `ticket_id=${id}`
            })
            .then(response => {
                return(response.status);
            })
            .then(status => {
                if (status == 200) {
                    window.location.replace("http://localhost:8001/inventory");
                }
                else {
                    alert("Error");
                }
            });
        }

        function exchange() {

        }

        function print() {

        }
        //tao ma qr
        //lay info cho qr
        var qrInfo='';
        function textGen(ticket){
        
            for (let key in ticket) {
               
                qrInfo =qrInfo +ticket[key];
              
            }
            //bat su kien click tren nut tao qrcode
            generate.addEventListener('click',(e)=>{
            e.preventDefault();
            isEmpty(qrInfo);          
        });
        }
        //kiem tra info rong hay ko
        function isEmpty(qrInfo){
            qrInfo.length>0?generateQRCode(qrInfo):alert('no information');
        }
        //gennerate qr
        function generateQRCode(qrInfo){
            
            qrcodebox.innerHTML="";
            new QRCode(qrcodebox,{
                text:qrInfo,
                height:100,
                width:100,
                colorLight:"#fff",
                colorDark:"#000"
            });

        }
        //dowload qr
        download.addEventListener('click',()=>{
            let img=document.querySelector('.body-qr img');
            if(img !== null){
            let imgAtrr=img.getAttribute('src');
            download.setAttribute("href",imgAtrr);
             }else{
                download.setAttribute('href',$(document.querySelector('canvas').toDataURL()));
             }
        });
    
    </script>
    
</html>

HTTP/1.1 200 OK

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
    <body>
        <div id="ticket-info"></div>
        <div>
            <button type="button" onclick="cancel()">Cancel</button>
            <button type="button" onclick="exchange()">Exchange</button>
            <button type="button" onclick="print()">Exchange</button>
            <button type="button" id="generate" >QRcode</button>
        </div>
        <a href="" id="download" download="QR_Code.png">Download</a>
        <div class="body_qr"></div>
        <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/qrcodejs/1.0.0/qrcode.min.js"></script>
    </body>
    <script>
        const url = window.location.pathname;
        const id = url.split("/")[2];
        const generate= document.getElementById('generate');
        const qrcodebox = document.querySelector('.body_qr');
        function renderTicket(ticket) {
            const ticketInfo = document.getElementById("ticket-info");
            for (let key in ticket) {
                const div = document.createElement("div");
                div.className = "ticket-info-column";
                div.innerHTML = ticket[key];
                ticketInfo.appendChild(div);
                console.log(typeof ticket[key]);
            }
        }
        
        fetch(`/ticket/${id}`, {
            method: "GET",
        })
        .then(response => {
            return(response.text());
        })
        .then(data => {
            const ticket = JSON.parse(data)[0];
            renderTicket(ticket);
            textGen(ticket);
        })
        
        function cancel() {
            fetch(`/own/${id}`, {
                method: "DELETE",
                headers: {
                    "Content-Type": "text/html"
                },
                body: `ticket_id=${id}`
            })
            .then(response => {
                return(response.status);
            })
            .then(status => {
                if (status == 200) {
                    window.location.replace("http://localhost:8001/inventory");
                }
                else {
                    alert("Error");
                }
            });
        }

        function exchange() {

        }

        function print() {

        }
        //tao ma qr
        //lay info cho qr
        var qrInfo='';
        function textGen(ticket){
        
            for (let key in ticket) {
               
                qrInfo =qrInfo +ticket[key];
              
            }
            //bat su kien click tren nut tao qrcode
            generate.addEventListener('click',(e)=>{
            e.preventDefault();
            isEmpty(qrInfo);          
        });
        }
        //kiem tra info rong hay ko
        function isEmpty(qrInfo){
            qrInfo.length>0?generateQRCode(qrInfo):alert('no information');
        }
        //gennerate qr
        function generateQRCode(qrInfo){
            
            qrcodebox.innerHTML="";
            new QRCode(qrcodebox,{
                text:qrInfo,
                height:100,
                width:100,
                colorLight:"#fff",
                colorDark:"#000"
            });

        }
        //dowload qr
        download.addEventListener('click',()=>{
            let img=document.querySelector('.body-qr img');
            if(img !== null){
            let imgAtrr=img.getAttribute('src');
            download.setAttribute("href",imgAtrr);
             }else{
                download.setAttribute('href',$(document.querySelector('canvas').toDataURL()));
             }
        });
    
    </script>
    
</html>

Mon Jan  1 10:04:01 2024

HTTP/1.1 200 OK

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
    <body>
        <div id="ticket-info"></div>
        <div>
            <button type="button" onclick="cancel()">Cancel</button>
            <button type="button" onclick="exchange()">Exchange</button>
            <button type="button" onclick="print()">Exchange</button>
            <button type="button" id="generate" >QRcode</button>
        </div>
        <a href="" id="download" download="QR_Code.png">Download</a>
        <div class="body_qr"></div>
        <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/qrcodejs/1.0.0/qrcode.min.js"></script>
    </body>
    <script>
        const url = window.location.pathname;
        const id = url.split("/")[2];
        const generate= document.getElementById('generate');
        const qrcodebox = document.querySelector('.body_qr');
        function renderTicket(ticket) {
            const ticketInfo = document.getElementById("ticket-info");
            for (let key in ticket) {
                const div = document.createElement("div");
                div.className = "ticket-info-column";
                div.innerHTML = ticket[key];
                ticketInfo.appendChild(div);
                console.log(typeof ticket[key]);
            }
        }
        
        fetch(`/ticket/${id}`, {
            method: "GET",
        })
        .then(response => {
            return(response.text());
        })
        .then(data => {
            const ticket = JSON.parse(data)[0];
            renderTicket(ticket);
            textGen(ticket);
        })
        
        function cancel() {
            fetch(`/own/${id}`, {
                method: "DELETE",
                headers: {
                    "Content-Type": "text/html"
                },
                body: `ticket_id=${id}`
            })
            .then(response => {
                return(response.status);
            })
            .then(status => {
                if (status == 200) {
                    window.location.replace("http://localhost:8001/inventory");
                }
                else {
                    alert("Error");
                }
            });
        }

        function exchange() {

        }

        function print() {

        }
        //tao ma qr
        //lay info cho qr
        var qrInfo='';
        function textGen(ticket){
        
            for (let key in ticket) {
               
                qrInfo =qrInfo +ticket[key];
              
            }
            //bat su kien click tren nut tao qrcode
            generate.addEventListener('click',(e)=>{
            e.preventDefault();
            isEmpty(qrInfo);          
        });
        }
        //kiem tra info rong hay ko
        function isEmpty(qrInfo){
            qrInfo.length>0?generateQRCode(qrInfo):alert('no information');
        }
        //gennerate qr
        function generateQRCode(qrInfo){
            
            qrcodebox.innerHTML="";
            new QRCode(qrcodebox,{
                text:qrInfo,
                height:100,
                width:100,
                colorLight:"#fff",
                colorDark:"#000"
            });

        }
        //dowload qr
        download.addEventListener('click',()=>{
            let img=document.querySelector('.body-qr img');
            if(img !== null){
            let imgAtrr=img.getAttribute('src');
            download.setAttribute("href",imgAtrr);
             }
        });
    
    </script>
    
</html>

Mon Jan  1 10:04:07 2024

HTTP/1.1 200 OK

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
    <body>
        <div id="ticket-info"></div>
        <div>
            <button type="button" onclick="cancel()">Cancel</button>
            <button type="button" onclick="exchange()">Exchange</button>
            <button type="button" onclick="print()">Exchange</button>
            <button type="button" id="generate" >QRcode</button>
        </div>
        <a href="" id="download" download="QR_Code.png">Download</a>
        <div class="body_qr"></div>
        <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/qrcodejs/1.0.0/qrcode.min.js"></script>
    </body>
    <script>
        const url = window.location.pathname;
        const id = url.split("/")[2];
        const generate= document.getElementById('generate');
        const qrcodebox = document.querySelector('.body_qr');
        function renderTicket(ticket) {
            const ticketInfo = document.getElementById("ticket-info");
            for (let key in ticket) {
                const div = document.createElement("div");
                div.className = "ticket-info-column";
                div.innerHTML = ticket[key];
                ticketInfo.appendChild(div);
                console.log(typeof ticket[key]);
            }
        }
        
        fetch(`/ticket/${id}`, {
            method: "GET",
        })
        .then(response => {
            return(response.text());
        })
        .then(data => {
            const ticket = JSON.parse(data)[0];
            renderTicket(ticket);
            textGen(ticket);
        })
        
        function cancel() {
            fetch(`/own/${id}`, {
                method: "DELETE",
                headers: {
                    "Content-Type": "text/html"
                },
                body: `ticket_id=${id}`
            })
            .then(response => {
                return(response.status);
            })
            .then(status => {
                if (status == 200) {
                    window.location.replace("http://localhost:8001/inventory");
                }
                else {
                    alert("Error");
                }
            });
        }

        function exchange() {

        }

        function print() {

        }
        //tao ma qr
        //lay info cho qr
        var qrInfo='';
        function textGen(ticket){
        
            for (let key in ticket) {
               
                qrInfo =qrInfo +ticket[key];
              
            }
            //bat su kien click tren nut tao qrcode
            generate.addEventListener('click',(e)=>{
            e.preventDefault();
            isEmpty(qrInfo);          
        });
        }
        //kiem tra info rong hay ko
        function isEmpty(qrInfo){
            qrInfo.length>0?generateQRCode(qrInfo):alert('no information');
        }
        //gennerate qr
        function generateQRCode(qrInfo){
            
            qrcodebox.innerHTML="";
            new QRCode(qrcodebox,{
                text:qrInfo,
                height:100,
                width:100,
                colorLight:"#fff",
                colorDark:"#000"
            });

        }
        //dowload qr
        download.addEventListener('click',()=>{
            let img=document.querySelector('.body-qr img');
            if(img !== null){
            let imgAtrr=img.getAttribute('src');
            download.setAttribute("href",imgAtrr);
             }
        });
    
    </script>
    
</html>

Mon Jan  1 10:08:44 2024

HTTP/1.1 200 OK

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="../static/index.css">
    <body>
        <h1>hello <span id="username"></span></h1>

        <a href="http://localhost:8001/login" class="auth">login</a>
        <a href="http://localhost:8001/register" class="auth">register</a>
        <a href="http://localhost:8001/inventory" class="nav">inventory</a>
        <a href="http://localhost:8001" onclick="logout()" class="nav">logout</a>

        <div id="tickets-info">
            <div id="tickets-search">
                <input type="text" name="from" id="from" placeholder="From">
                <input type="text" name="to" id="to" placeholder="To">
                <input type="airline" name="airline" id="airline" placeholder="Airline">
                <input type="datetime-local" name="datetime" id="datetime">
                <button type="button" onclick="filter()">Filter</button>
            </div>
            <div id="tickets-column">
                <span>Flight</span>
                <span>From</span>
                <span>To</span>
                <span>Date</span>
                <span>Time</span>
                <span>Airline</span>
                <span>Ticket</span>
                <span>Seat</span>
                <span>Price</span>
            </div>
            <ul id="tickets"></ul>
        </div>

    </body>

    <script>
        let tickets = [];
        let filteredTickets = [];

        // hien thi elements tuy thuoc vao trang thai dang nhap
        let username = localStorage.getItem("username");
        let authElements = document.querySelectorAll(".auth");
        let navElements = document.querySelectorAll(".nav");
        if (username != null) {
            document.getElementById("username").innerHTML = username;
            authElements.forEach(item => item.style.display = "none");
            navElements.forEach(item => item.style.display = "block");
        }
        else {
            authElements.forEach(item => item.style.display = "block");
            navElements.forEach(item => item.style.display = "none");
        }

        // xoa data nguoi dung duoc luu trong ls
        function logout() {
            localStorage.clear();
        }

        function filter() {
            let from = document.getElementById("from").value;
            let to = document.getElementById("to").value;
            let airline = document.getElementById("airline").value;
            let datetime= document.getElementById("datetime").value;
            filteredTickets = tickets;
            console.log(`from: ${from}, to: ${to}, datetime: ${datetime}`);
            if (from != "") {
                filteredTickets = filteredTickets.filter(flight => 
                    flight.from.includes(from));
            }
            if (to != "") {
                filteredTickets = filteredTickets.filter(flight => 
                    flight.to.includes(to));
            }
            if (airline != "") {
                filteredTickets = filteredTickets.filter(flight => 
                    flight.airline.includes(airline));
            }
            if (datetime != "") {
                filteredTickets = filteredTickets.filter(flight => 
                    Date.parse(datetime)== Date.parse(`${flight.date}T${flight.time}:00`));
            }
            renderTickets();
        }

        function renderTickets() {
            const ul = document.getElementById("tickets");
            ul.innerHTML = ""; // xoa cac element da co de them tu dau
            filteredTickets.forEach(ticket => {
                const li = document.createElement("li");
                li.className = "ticket";
                for (const key in ticket) {
                    const span = document.createElement("span");
                    span.textContent = ticket[key];
                    li.appendChild(span);
                }
                const a = document.createElement("a");
                a.setAttribute("href", `http://localhost:8001/buy/${ticket.ticket_id}`);
                a.innerHTML = "Buy";
                li.appendChild(a);
                ul.appendChild(li);
            });
        }

        fetch("/tickets", {
            method: "GET",
        })
        .then(response => {
            return(response.text());
        })
        .then(data => {
            tickets = JSON.parse(data);
            filteredTickets = tickets;
            renderTickets();
        })
    </script>
</html>
